translation.es: Deberías ir al entrenamiento de maestros.

translation.en: And so it's this closed, incestuous system
translation.es: Y se vuelve un sistema cerrado e incestuoso

translation.en: not only that Bikram would get rich and become more powerful,
translation.es: no solo que Bikram se haga rico y se vuelva más poderoso,

translation.en: it ensures that he will continue to have
translation.es: también garantiza que seguirá teniendo

translation.en: a crop of women who are held captive during this training.
translation.es: una cosecha de mujeres cautivas durante el entrenamiento.

translation.en: depended upon keeping the silence.
translation.es: dependía de mantener el silencio.

translation.en: Rajashree, his wife, in particular.
translation.es: Rajashree, su esposa, en particular.

translation.en: She wanted to continue to carry her Birkin bag and drive her Bentley.
translation.es: Quería seguir teniendo su bolso Birkin y su Bentley.

translation.en: She knew exactly what her husband was doing.
translation.es: Ella sabía exactamente lo que su esposo hacía.

translation.en: From the time we decided to bring the lawsuit,
translation.es: Desde que decidimos presentar la demanda,

translation.en: it took three years to get the case to trial.
translation.es: nos tomó tres años llevar el caso a juicio.

translation.en: He's always resisted any pre- trial stuff.
translation.es: Siempre se resistió a cualquier cosa previa al juicio.

translation.en: Bikram used to always say to me,
translation.es: DECLARACIÓN PREVIA AL JUICIO Él siempre me decía:

translation.en: Famous people don't do depositions.
translation.es: La gente famosa no hace declaraciones.

translation.en: He would always be on my case to get his depositions postponed
translation.es: Siempre tenía que posponer o cancelar

translation.en: We knew that they would use all of the tactics, which was delay, delay, delay.
translation.es: Sabíamos que usarían todas las tácticas para generar retrasos.

translation.en: I think he went through, like, seven different sets of lawyers.
translation.es: Creo que pasó por siete abogados diferentes.

translation.en: Because Bikram considers himself to be above the law.
translation.es: Porque Bikram se considera superior a la ley.

translation.en: You're here today. I'm here today to take the deposition.
translation.es: Estás aquí hoy, estoy aquí para tomar la declaración.

translation.en: If you think you're going to suspend the deposition--
translation.es: Si suspenderás la declaración...

translation.en: 'cause we're gonna say what we're gonna say.
translation.es: Porque diremos lo que vamos a decir.

translation.en: - I'm going to say what I'm going to say. - Please don't raise your voice.
translation.es: - Voy a decir lo que voy a decir. - Por favor, baja la voz.

translation.en: I'm simply telling you that you're not going to tell me--
translation.es: Solo digo que no me vas a decir...

translation.en: Please don't interrupt me.  You were interrupting me!
translation.es: - No me interrumpas, por favor. - Tú me interrumpes a mí

translation.en: If they could provoke me and goad me
translation.es: Si lograban provocarme e incitarme

translation.en: into calling the deposition or walking out,
translation.es: a cancelar la declaración o a abandonar,

translation.en: it would be to their advantage and to my client's detriment.
translation.es: se hubieran beneficiado y eso habría perjudicado a mi cliente.

translation.en: that you provoke this to the point that I'm going to suspend the deposition.
translation.es: hasta lograr que suspenda la declaración.

translation.en: Let me tell you, we've waited for a year...
translation.es: Déjame decirte que esperamos un año...

translation.en: - Great, then take it. Go. - ...to get this deposition.
translation.es: - Genial, aprovéchala. - ...para esta declaración.

translation.en: We've had to go to court. We've had to get your client sanctioned to get here.
translation.es: Tuvimos que ir a la corte. Tuvimos que sancionar a tu cliente.

translation.en: You've now wasted ten minutes of your deposition time.
translation.es: Desperdiciaste diez minutos de tu declaración.

translation.en: - So you won't provoke me-- - Go ahead.
translation.es: - No me provocarás. - Adelante.

translation.en: And he didn't like being forced to sit in a chair and answer questions,
translation.es: Y no le gustaba ser forzado a sentarse y responder preguntas,

translation.en: Don't stop me when I'm talking.  Mr. Choudhury.
translation.es: - No me interrumpas. - Señor Choudhury.

translation.en: This is where the judge... Please. Please, don't stop me.
translation.es: - Aquí es donde el juez... - Por favor, no interrumpas.

translation.en: - ...for poor behavior. - You--
translation.es: - ...por mal comportamiento. - Tú.

translation.en: Whose behavior? Talking about behavior?
translation.es: ¿De quién es el mal comportamiento?

translation.en: Do you know how to spell behavior?
translation.es: ¿Sabe cómo escribir comportamiento?

translation.en: You are the most misbehaved person I ever met in my entire life.
translation.es: Tienes el peor comportamiento que vi en toda mi vida.

translation.en: You can take brass and polish a thousand years.
translation.es: Puedes tomar bronce y pulir mil años.

translation.en: Would you like to take a break, Mr. Choudhury?
translation.es: ¿Quiere un receso, Sr. Choudhury?

translation.en: You cannot take a donkey and train for a hundred years.
translation.es: Si tienes un burro y lo entrenas cien años,

translation.en: That's why you've got divorce in this country.
translation.es: Por eso te divorciaste en este país.

translation.en: So, I guess having been called the donkey by Mr. Choudhury will go off the record.
translation.es: No hace falta registrar que el Sr. Choudhury me trató de burra.

translation.en: engage in those kind of personal attacks,
translation.es: se involucraba en esos ataques personales,

translation.en: I thought, This is what's going to happen at trial.
translation.es: pensaba: Esto es lo que pasará en el juicio.

translation.en: Uh, you have said that there are three things you don't like.
translation.es: DECLARACIÓN PREVIA AL JUICIO Dijiste que hay tres cosas que odias.

translation.en: No, you are wrong. Not three things, four things.
translation.es: No, te equivocas. Son cuatro cosas.

translation.en: What are they? I always said I don't like...
translation.es: - ¿Qué son? - Siempre dije que odio...

translation.en: The founder of Bikram Yoga was in an LA court.
translation.es: El fundador de Bikram Yoga estuvo en una corte de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: He's accused of firing his lawyer
translation.es: Está acusado de despedir a su abogada

translation.en: for investigating claims of sexual harassment.
translation.es: por investigar acusaciones de acoso sexual.

translation.en: Micki's case involved claims primarily for sexual harassment,
translation.es: El caso de Micki involucraba demandas, principalmente, por acoso sexual,

translation.en: gender discrimination, wrongful termination.
translation.es: discriminación de género, despido injustificado.

translation.en: Those were what I'll call the core claims.
translation.es: Esas eran las demandas básicas.

translation.en: When I was questioning various witnesses,
translation.es: Cuando interrogué a varios testigos,

translation.en: I would often stand behind Bikram,
translation.es: generalmente me mantenía detrás de Bikram.

translation.en: and they would try to position their chair so I couldn't get close to him.
translation.es: y trataron de colocar su silla para que no pudiera acercarme.

translation.es: En un momento, exigió que sus abogados le pidieran al juez

translation.en: Miss Minnard can go wherever she wants in the courtroom.
translation.es: La señorita Minnard puede ir adonde quiera en la sala.

translation.en: I remember one of the lawyers actually said to Carla,
translation.es: Recuerdo que uno de los abogados le dijo a Carla:

translation.en: It would be malpractice for us to allow Bikram to testify on his own behalf.
translation.es: Sería negligencia permitir que Bikram testifique en nombre propio. ABOGADO DEL TRIBUNAL

translation.en: His prior testimony had been, I'm bankrupt,
translation.es: Su testimonio anterior fue: Estoy en bancarrota,

translation.en: I live on borrowed money from my family.
translation.es: vivo con dinero prestado de mi familia.

translation.en: I haven't earned any money in the last three years.
translation.es: No tuvimos ganancias en los últimos tres años.

translation.en: We had pictures of his children, you know, on shopping sprees,
translation.es: Teníamos fotos de sus hijos haciendo compras,

translation.en: on Rodeo Drive in their convertible Ferraris
translation.es: en Rodeo Drive en sus Ferrari convertibles.

translation.en: saying, Thank you, Daddy, for the new car.
translation.es: y comentaban: Papi, gracias por el auto nuevo.

translation.en: I asked him, I said, Well, if you don't have any income,
translation.es: Le dije: ¿Con qué ingresos le compró a su esposa

translation.en: how is it that you bought your wife a $350,000 Bentley two weeks ago?
translation.es: un Bentley de 350 000 dólares hace dos semanas?

translation.en: I could see the wheels turning when he realized he was sort of trapped.
translation.es: Vi que intentaba pensar excusas cuando se vio atrapado.

translation.en: So I said, Well, if you don't own them, who does?
translation.es: Y le dije: Si no eres el dueño, ¿de quién son?

translation.en: And he said, The State of California.
translation.es: Y dijo: Son del estado de California.

translation.en: So, okay. Well, how is it that the State of California owns all these cars in this warehouse?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué el estado de California guarda estos autos en tu garaje?

translation.en: And he goes, Well, I have a deal with Jerry Brown.
translation.es: Y él dice: Tengo un trato con Jerry Brown.

translation.en: I said, Jerry Brown, the governor? He said, Yes.
translation.es: Le digo: Jerry Brown, ¿el gobernador? Y dijo: Sí.

translation.en: You can see the jury is leaning forward in their seat,
translation.es: Ahí el jurado se movía en sus asientos

translation.en: I'm like, Okay, so what was the deal you had with Jerry Brown?
translation.es: Y pregunto: ¿Cuál era el trato con Jerry Brown?

translation.en: I promised to give all my cars to the State of California.
translation.es: Prometí donar mis autos al estado de California.

translation.en: And I go, Okay, and in exchange for that, what did you get?

translation.en: And he said, Jerry Brown and the state agreed to build a school in my name.
translation.es: Dice: Ellos acordaron construir una escuela en mi nombre .

translation.en: And he said, An engineering school.
translation.es: Y responde: Una escuela de ingeniería.

translation.en: Well, I said, What's the name of this school?
translation.es: Le digo: ¿Cómo se llama la escuela?

translation.en: School of Engineering for Children, so that they can build Bentleys.
translation.es: Bikram de Ingeniería para Niños, para que aprendan a construir Bentleys.

translation.en: He was making it up as he went along, and that's when the jury started laughing.
translation.es: Lo inventaba a medida que lo decía. Y ahí el jurado se echó a reír.

translation.en: And then he went on this whole rant about having healed President Nixon.
translation.es: Y luego empezó a decir que había curado al presidente Nixon.

translation.en: President Nixon got Bikram a visa
translation.es: el presidente Nixon le dio una visa

translation.en: so that he could become a United States citizen.
translation.es: para convertirlo en ciudadano estadounidense.

translation.en: We actually contacted the Nixon Library,
translation.es: Nos comunicamos con la Biblioteca Nixon,

translation.en: gave them the time frame when this allegedly happened.
translation.es: les dimos el plazo aproximado de cuándo sucedió.

translation.en: The name Bikram Choudhury did not come up once.
translation.es: El nombre Bikram Choudhury no apareció.

translation.en: In his head, I think he thinks what he says is the truth,
translation.es: En su cabeza, creo que piensa que lo que dice es verdad,

translation.en: clearly what he's saying is not true, he'll say it.
translation.es: Claramente, lo que dice no es verdad.

translation.en: In many ways, he really is dumb as a post.
translation.es: En muchos sentidos, es muy tonto.

translation.en: He stepped down off that witness stand and gave his lawyers the thumbs up.
translation.es: Bajó del estrado y le hizo así a sus abogados.

translation.en: Uh, that's how disconnected he is from reality at times.
translation.es: Así de desconectado está de la realidad a veces.

translation.en: First, reports started coming in of what was going wrong with his empire.
translation.es: Primero, llegaron informes de lo que pasaba con su imperio.

translation.en: When I started my research into Bikram's roots in Calcutta,
translation.es: Cuando comencé a investigar las raíces de Bikram en Calcuta,

translation.en: the more I was intrigued and drawn to it
translation.es: más me intrigaba y me atraía... PERIODISTA

translation.en: because I was not getting the right answers.
translation.es: ...porque no recibía las respuestas correctas.

translation.es: Una de las últimas entrevistas que dio fue para la revista Elle.

translation.en: He said, I don't know. He seemed to be like this typical character from North Calcutta
translation.es: Él dijo: No sé. Parecía ser el típico personaje de Calcuta del Norte

translation.en: There would be this guy sitting in a North Calcutta...
translation.es: Había un tipo sentado en Calcuta del Norte...

translation.en: I went on an expedition to the Amazon forest.
translation.es: fui a una expedición a la selva amazónica.

translation.en: To actually find someone in flesh and blood
translation.es: Encontrar a alguien de carne y hueso

translation.en: who was capable of spinning these yarns
translation.es: que fuera capaz de hilar todo esto

translation.en: So the world has President Nixon to thank for Bikram?
translation.es: ¿El mundo debe agradecerte por ayudar al presidente Nixon?

translation.en: when you teach 10,000 people, you said, I taught ten million people.
translation.es: cuando enseñas a diez mil personas, dices Tuve diez millones de alumnos.

translation.en: Bikram three times served as national yoga champion of India.
translation.es: Bikram fue tres veces campeón nacional de yoga en la India.

translation.en: I don't know what yoga championship he's talking about.
translation.es: No sé de qué campeonato de yoga habla.

translation.en: At that time, competitive yoga didn't really happen.
translation.es: En esa época, no había competencias de yoga.

translation.en: There was no formal yoga contest
translation.es: No había campeonatos formales de yoga

translation.en: that he could have won for five times in a row,
translation.es: que pueda haber ganado cinco veces seguidas,

translation.en: he was still doing things like bodybuilding and stunt shows.
translation.es: aún practicaba fisicoculturismo y hacía espectáculos de acrobacias.

translation.en: I'm the smartest man in the world you ever met in your entire life.
translation.es: Soy el hombre más listo del mundo, el más listo que hayan conocido.

translation.en: Twenty- six postures, two breathing exercises.
translation.es: Veintiséis posturas, dos ejercicios de respiración.

translation.en: After talking to some of his contemporaries here,
translation.es: Al hablar con algunos de sus contemporáneos de aquí,

translation.en: this 26 plus two that he keeps talking about, these postures were not created by him.
translation.es: él no creó las 26 posturas ni los ejercicios de respiración.

translation.en: Perhaps the greatest yoga therapist.
translation.es: Quizá el mejor terapeuta de yoga.

translation.en: When I heard that Bikram declared my master's yoga as Bikram Yoga,
translation.es: Cuando oí que Bikram nombró al yoga de mi maestro como Bikram Yoga,

translation.en: I can teach something which I learned from my master,
translation.es: Puedo enseñar algo que aprendí de mi maestro,

translation.en: that I must tell my student that it is not mine.
translation.es: debo decirle a mi alumno que no es mío.

translation.en: He told that 26 plus two yoga is Bikram Yoga.
translation.es: Dijo que el el yoga que enseña es Bikram Yoga.

translation.en: That is basically based on my master's booklet.
translation.es: Básicamente se basa en el manual de mi maestro.

translation.en: That booklet very fortunately has now been published.
translation.es: FACULTAD DE EDUCACIÓN FÍSICA DE GHOSH Ese folleto, afortunadamente, ya ha sido publicado.

translation.en: because I had the only one, single copy perhaps in the world.
translation.es: porque, probablemente, tenía la única copia en el mundo.

translation.en: Americans nice, sweet people. They don't call it cheating.
translation.es: Los americanos son amables, dulces. No le dicen trampa.

translation.en: They call-- You don't call it stealing. You say, Just take it over.
translation.es: No dicen robar sino tomar prestado.

translation.en: He's been playing hopscotch with facts and the truth for all his life.
translation.es: Ha estado jugando a la rayuela con los hechos y la verdad toda su vida.

translation.en: The jury deliberated for little more than a day and a half.
translation.es: El jurado deliberó por poco más de un día y medio.

translation.en: They found in Micki's favor on every single claim
translation.es: El veredicto fue a favor de Micki en cada demanda.

translation.en: A Los Angeles jury hit Bikram Choudhury
translation.es: ENERO DE 2016 Un jurado de Los Ángeles golpea a Bikram Choudhury

translation.en: with nearly seven and a half million dollars in damages
translation.es: Un jurado de Los Ángeles golpea a Bikram Choudhury con casi siete millones y medio de dólares en daños a su exasesora legal.

translation.en: What I wanted to show my daughter was that I could stand up,
translation.es: Quería mostrarle a mi hija que podía enfrentarme a esto,

translation.en: so, work through the fear and still stand up.
translation.es: O sea, superar el miedo y aun así seguir de pie.

translation.en: Their verdict concluded that he had acted with malice, oppression, or fraud.
translation.es: El veredicto concluyó que había actuado con malicia, opresión o fraude.

translation.en: It was deeply satisfying to see him run out of the courtroom.
translation.es: Fue muy reconfortante verlo salir corriendo del tribunal.

translation.en: He was hot- stepping it like he were on fire.
translation.es: Salió como si estuviera en llamas.

translation.en: - Can we speak with you? - Please don't bother me. Please.
translation.es: - ¿Podemos hablar con usted? - Por favor, no me molesten.

translation.en: Can you say anything about any of the other lawsuits
translation.es: ¿Puede decir algo sobre las otras causas

translation.en: that are being filed against you?
translation.es: que se están presentando en su contra?

translation.en: He was on his heels for a change after all he had done.
translation.es: Finalmente, después de todo lo que hizo, por primera vez se lo veía perseguido.

translation.en: accused of hiding assets and now fleeing the country
translation.es: con causas por esconder bienes y por abuso sexual...

translation.en: amid allegations of sex assault.
translation.es: GRAN CAÍDA ...ahora huye del país.

translation.en: Bikram Choudhury never paid the judgment against him.
translation.es: Bikram Choudhury nunca pagó el juicio en su contra.

translation.en: Authorities believe the 69- year- old Choudhury has hidden assets,
translation.es: Las autoridades creen que Choudhury, de 69 años, tiene activos ocultos

translation.en: He and his wife filed a... what we believe to be a sham divorce,
translation.es: Él y su esposa presentaron un... lo que creemos que es un falso divorcio.

translation.en: where all of the assets that he had went into his wife Rajashree's name
translation.es: Todos los activos que tenía pasaron a nombre de su esposa Rajashree

translation.en: wherever he is, I don't care if he's in Timbuktu,
translation.es: que esté donde esté, no importa si es en Tombuctú,

translation.en: and he needs to know that I've made this order.
translation.es: Él debe saber que tiene esta resolución.

translation.en: When my process servers served him in Thailand,
translation.es: Cuando los agentes judiciales intentaron notificarlo en Tailandia,

translation.en: they were faced with brutal attacks.
translation.es: se enfrentaron a ataques brutales.

translation.en: - Those are legal documents. - Legal documents, my ass! Fuck you!
translation.es: - Son documentos legales. - ¡Vete a la mierda!

translation.en: - You've been served. - Served my ass, asshole. Get out.
translation.es: - Ha sido notificado. - Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: There's probably been several thousand hours spent trying to collect this judgment.
translation.es: Probablemente se invirtieron miles de horas para cobrar este juicio.

translation.en: But Micki herself hasn't collected a penny.
translation.es: Pero Micki no cobró ni un centavo.

translation.en: The civil court can only do so much with a debtor who has fled the jurisdiction.
translation.es: El tribunal civil no puede hacer mucho contra un deudor fuera de la jurisdicción.

translation.en: I don't know why he hasn't been charged criminally.
translation.es: No sé por qué no ha sido acusado penalmente.

translation.en: I think there's a tremendous reluctance
translation.es: Creo que hay una reticencia... FISCAL DEL DISTRITO DE LOS ÁNGELES

translation.en: on the part of the District Attorney to go after powerful men.
translation.es: FISCAL DEL DISTRITO DE LOS ÁNGELES ...de la fiscal del distrito a perseguir hombres poderosos.

translation.en: So I sent Jackie Lacey a letter
translation.es: Le envié una carta a Jackie Lacey

translation.en: after more than half a dozen women came forward,
translation.es: después de que se presentaran más de seis mujeres,

translation.en: why her office chose not to prosecute him.
translation.es: la fiscalía decidió no procesarlo.

translation.en: She didn't have a satisfactory answer, to me.
translation.es: Ella no tenía una respuesta satisfactoria.

translation.en: Well, if Jackie Lacey were to wake up at some point and decide to pursue Bikram...
translation.es: Bueno, si Jackie Lacey se despertara y decidiera perseguir a Bikram...

translation.en: ...all of the testimony that Bikram gave in his civil case
translation.es: todos los testimonios que Bikram dio en su caso civil

translation.en: Bikram pled the Fifth Amendment
translation.es: Bikram invocó la Quinta Enmienda muchas veces.

translation.en: - multiple times in his deposition. - I take Fifth Amendment. Thank you.
translation.es: Bikram invocó la Quinta Enmienda muchas veces. Invoco la Quinta, gracias.

translation.en: When you take the Fifth Amendment in that manner as Bikram did,
translation.es: Cuando invocas la Quinta Enmienda tantas veces

translation.en: you know, there is an inference of guilt.
translation.es: se puede inferir cierta culpabilidad.

translation.en: when those students, according to you,
translation.es: cuando esas estudiantes, según dice,

translation.en: said they would kill themselves unless you had sex with them?
translation.es: dijeron que se matarían a menos que tuviera sexo con ellas?

translation.en: You had female students masturbate you
translation.es: ¿Hacía que las alumnas lo masturbaran

translation.en: during teacher training at the LAX Radisson.
translation.es: durante el entrenamiento de maestros?

translation.en: Isn't that right, Mr. Choudhury?
translation.es: ¿Es cierto eso, señor Choudhury?

translation.en: All of that testimony would be admissible in a criminal case.
translation.es: Todo ese testimonio podría usarse en una causa penal.

translation.en: In my mind, there's absolutely no reason that a criminal case can't be pursued.
translation.es: En mi opinión, no hay motivos para no iniciar una causa penal.

translation.en: I wanted to sit in court and look him straight in the eye.
translation.es: Quería sentarme en la corte y mirarlo directamente a los ojos.

translation.en: And I wanted him to see me and what he did to me.
translation.es: Y quería que me viera y que vea lo que me hizo.

translation.en: Micki's case was the first case.
translation.es: El caso de Micki fue el primero.

translation.en: And then you have all these other cases coming up behind, and those victims have to make a decision.
translation.es: Luego llegaron los otros casos y esas víctimas debían tomar una decisión.

translation.en: Are we gonna go in and try our case against Bikram who's not here anymore because he's fled the country?
translation.es: ¿Vamos a continuar el caso contra Bikram ahora que huyó del país?

translation.en: And you gotta say, Why do I wanna do that?
translation.es: Y piensas: ¿Por qué quiero hacer eso?

translation.en: If and when I win, I'm not going to collect.
translation.es: Si cuando gane, si es que gano, no voy a cobrar.

translation.en: And I think that's what happened with some of the other cases that were behind Micki's.
translation.es: Y creo que eso pasó con los otros casos que vinieron después de Micki.

translation.en: You know, my option was to go to court and get re- traumatized,
translation.es: Mi opción era ir a la corte, volver a traumatizarme,

translation.en: and he wasn't even gonna be there.
translation.es: y él ni siquiera iba a estar ahí.

translation.en: and I'm able to actually move on in my life.
translation.es: y puedo seguir adelante con mi vida.

translation.en: But when you choose to settle, you're not really getting justice.
translation.es: Pero cuando decides acordar, no estás haciendo justicia.

translation.en: The sum of money that we settled for didn't cover very much.
translation.es: El dinero que acordamos no cubría mucho.

translation.en: I didn't imagine that I would ever settle.
translation.es: No imaginé que alguna vez me conformaría.

translation.en: And, in fact, I turned down multiple settlement offers...
translation.es: De hecho, rechacé varias propuestas de acuerdo...

translation.en: The whole experience for me reminded me of one of those old- fashioned Polaroid pictures.
translation.es: Toda la experiencia me recordó a unas viejas fotos Polaroid.

translation.en: You'd pull it out of the camera, and it slowly develops in front of you.
translation.es: La sacas de la cámara y lentamente aparece frente a ti.

translation.en: And finally, it had developed. I had seen enough.
translation.es: Y, finalmente, estaba lista. Ya había visto suficiente.

translation.en: I even realized that I have a characteristic of staying too long in situations that I probably should have left sooner.
translation.es: Y noté que suelo quedarme demasiado en lugares que debería haber dejado antes.

translation.en: I had moved to New Orleans in 2015, and I was teaching at a studio in New Orleans.
