translation.en: for fried chicken from a slave named Jubalai.
translation.es: ...a un esclavo llamado Jubalai.

translation.en: Now, I give him credit for the coleslaw, but that's it.
translation.es: La ensalada de col sí es de él, pero nada más.

translation.en: I need a favor. I need you to pick up Uncle Russell.
translation.es: Necesito un favor, que recojas al tío Russell.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's a hassle, but you're the closest.
translation.es: Ya sé que es una molestia, pero estás cerca.

translation.en: - Damn! He's always in a bad mood. - Just say you'll do it. We'll do it.
translation.es: -¡Maldita sea! ¡Siempre está de mal humor! -Di que lo recogerás.

translation.en: It's not a mood if he's always in it. It's his personality. Can you do it?
translation.es: Siempre está así. Es su personalidad. ¿Puedes ir?

translation.en: There were so many things we wanted to do still.
translation.es: Había tantas cosas que todavía queríamos hacer.

translation.en: Travel. We were going to Australia and China.
translation.es: Viajar. Íbamos a ir a Australia y China.

translation.en: That's not the point. I haven't been feeling well.
translation.es: Esa no es la cuestión. No me siento bien.

translation.en: Who knows how long I'm gonna live without him?
translation.es: ¡Quién sabe cuánto vaya a vivir sin él!

translation.en: It might make a difference if I had a grandchild
translation.es: Sería diferente si tuviera un nieto...

translation.en: who could take my mind off of everything, but...
translation.es: ...que me distrajera de todo esto, pero...

translation.en: - Oh, well. - Cynthia, we are trying.
translation.es: -...bueno. -Cynthia, estamos tratando.

translation.en: I know what you're trying to do, Michelle, all hours of the day and night, trying.
translation.es: Yo sé lo que estás tratando de hacer a todas horas del día y de la noche.

translation.en: But it doesn't seem to be working, now does it?
translation.es: Pero no está funcionando, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Where's Ryan? - Have you talked to him yet? - He should be here soon.
translation.es: -¿Dónde está Ryan? ¿Ya hablaste con él? -Va a llegar pronto.

translation.en: Just to see his face would make me feel so much better.
translation.es: Con sólo verle la cara me voy a sentir mejor.

translation.en: Oh, I have missed him so much. My baby.
translation.es: Lo he extrañado muchísimo. Mi bebé.

translation.en: You could take your hand off my husband's coffin.
translation.es: Puedes quitar la mano del ataúd de mi esposo.

translation.en: Is she shooting us the finger? Or is she just waving?
translation.es: ¿Nos está insultando o saludando?

translation.en: - He's okay. - He's gonna need assistance?
translation.es: -Está bien. -¿Va a necesitar ayuda?

translation.en: I came to pick you up and take you to the funeral.
translation.es: ¡Vine para llevarlo al funeral!

translation.en: Where the fuck you been, you fat bastard? You took any longer, I'd be dead, too!
translation.es: ¿Dónde estabas, gordo? ¡Por poco me muero de viejo!

translation.en: - They're right here. - All right, cool. Can I come and get them?
translation.es: -Aquí están. -¿Puedo ir por ellas?

translation.en: - I have a funeral to go to. Shit! - Whatever. Man, I'll come over there.
translation.es: -Tengo que ir a un funeral. ¡Mierda! -Puedo ir por ellas.

translation.en: No, no, I'm not gonna try them. I made them.
translation.es: No las voy a probar. Yo las hice.

translation.en: I got to go. Never get high on your own supply.
translation.es: Me voy. Nunca te drogues con tu inventario.

translation.en: And, dude, this shit's gonna blow your mind, I guarantee it.
translation.es: Quedarás fuera de órbita, te lo garantizo.

translation.en: All I got to do is just put some pants on.
translation.es: Sólo necesito ponerme unos pantalones.

translation.en: And this is my house, so... You all right, man?
translation.es: Y esta es mi casa. ¿Estás bien, amigo?

translation.en: - A car almost ran into us, and I was yelling. - And this guy just jumped right in our lane.
translation.es: -Casi chocamos y yo estaba gritando. -Un tipo se metió a nuestro carril.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, baby, I... - No, baby, it's fine. It's fine, okay?
translation.es: -Perdón, nena... -No, está bien.

translation.en: - Go put on your pants, please. - All right.
translation.es: Ponte unos pantalones, por favor.

translation.en: And make sure they're black, Jeffrey!
translation.es: ¡Y asegúrate de que sean negros!

translation.en: - I'm so hungry. - God, my heart is racing.
translation.es: -Tengo hambre. -Mi corazón está acelerado.

translation.en: Oh, here. Take this one. It'll calm you down. Jeff won't mind.
translation.es: Mira. Tómate esto. Te va a calmar. No le va a importar.

translation.en: It's Valium. I used to take it all the time. It's gonna make you feel better, I promise.
translation.es: Es Valium. Yo lo tomaba mucho. Te vas a sentir mejor.

translation.en: - Yes. - You know, I shouldn't be taking someone else's pills, right?
translation.es: No debería tomas las pastillas de otro.

translation.en: - No, it's okay. - I got to drive and...
translation.es: -Está bien. -Tengo que manejar y...

translation.en: Babe, I'll drive. All right? Just open wide. There we go. Take...
translation.es: Yo manejo. ¿Está bien? Abre la boca. Eso es.

translation.en: - Oh, my keys. - Jeff, you're wearing sneakers?
translation.es: -Mis llaves. -¿Te pusiste tenis?

translation.en: - Forget it. Let's just go. Can I just... - No, I got it.
translation.es: -Olvídalo. Vámonos. Dame... -Yo la llevo.

translation.en: You can't understand death until you've given life.
translation.es: Para entender a la muerte hay que dar vida.

translation.en: Mama, I know this is hard, but it's gonna be okay,
translation.es: Yo sé que esto es difícil, pero todo va a salir bien.

translation.en: Oh, Ryan, you always know exactly what to say, always!
translation.es: ¡Ay, siempre sabes exactamente qué decir!

translation.en: I guess if people died every week, we'd see you all the time.
translation.es: Si hubiera más muertes, te veríamos mucho.

translation.en: - Hey, big bro. How you doing? - Holding up.
translation.es: -Hola, hermano. ¿Cómo estás? -Aguantando.

translation.en: - How was your flight, Ryan? - It was okay.
translation.es: -¿Cómo estuvo tu vuelo? -Bien...

translation.en: But I had to buy the seat next to me. I just can't do the small talk anymore.
translation.es: ...pero tuve que comprar el asiento de al lado. Ya no aguanto estar charlando.

translation.en: And while I'm sitting there, up in first class, they march all the broke people through.
translation.es: Y mientras estoy ahí sentado, en primera clase, pasa toda la gente quebrada.

translation.en: And a couple of them eyeballing me, mad because I'm snacking on warm nuts.
translation.es: Unos me miran enojados porque me dieron nueces calientes.

translation.en: So I'm like, Take your broke, no- nuts ass to the back of the plane.
translation.es: Yo pensaba: “Llévense sus traseros pobres a la zona de atrás”.

translation.en: Plus, there was tons of turbulence,
translation.es: Además, hubo mucha turbulencia.

translation.en: but I guess that's the thing about flying first class.
translation.es: Esa es la verdad sobre ir en primera.

translation.en: No matter how much you pay, if the plane crashes, you still end up dead.
translation.es: Por mucho que pagues, si el avión se estrella, tú también acabas muerto.

translation.en: Hey. I love it when you come to family functions, man.
translation.es: Me encanta que vengas a reuniones familiares.

translation.en: Because Dad takes his pure hate out on you.
translation.es: Papá descarga su odio sobre ti.

translation.en: Like a Dalmatian or a Schnauzer?
translation.es: ¿Un dálmata o un grifón alemán?

translation.en: - Honey, what are you talking about? - I don't know.
translation.es: -¿De qué estás hablando? -No sé.

translation.en: It's just a shame that somebody has to die to get the family together.
translation.es: Lástima que alguien tenga que morir para reunirnos.

translation.en: It was hard to see Dad like this. He's in a better place now, right?
translation.es: Fue duro ver a papá así. Está en un lugar mejor, ¿no?

translation.en: - He was sick a long time. - Since when does dead beat sick?
translation.es: -Estuvo enfermo mucho tiempo. -¿Es mejor estar muerto que enfermo?

translation.en: You know what I mean. This is why I try not to get close to people.
translation.es: Tú me entiendes. Trato de no encariñarme con nadie.

translation.en: - Too much emotion involved. - Guess that's why you never call.
translation.es: -Es demasiada emoción. -Por eso nunca llamas.

translation.en: Some families see each other all the time, some meet up at funerals.
translation.es: Unas familias se ven mucho, otras, en funerales.

translation.en: Hey, listen, I know this is a bad time, but I'm gonna need that money.
translation.es: Yo sé que es un mal momento, pero necesito ese dinero.

translation.en: - Shit. - We're splitting these costs, right?
translation.es: -Mierda. -Vamos a dividirnos los gastos.

translation.en: You just bought a first class ticket for your toothbrush.
translation.es: ¡Tu cepillo de dientes voló en primera!

translation.en: I lost a lot of shit when the market collapsed.
translation.es: Perdí mucho dinero en la bolsa.

translation.en: So, if you don't mind, we gonna have to discuss this later.
translation.es: Tendremos que discutir esto después.

translation.en: - No, no, no, no, let's discuss this right now. - Hey, you mind?
translation.es: -No, ahora mismo. -¿Me permites?

translation.en: You got to get to these funerals early.
translation.es: Hay que llegar temprano a los funerales.

translation.en: - What? There's a spot right there. Grab it. - That looks like it's too close to the corner.
translation.es: -Ahí hay un lugar. -¡Está muy cerca de la esquina!

translation.en: - Nah. You can wedge it in there. Grab it. - I don't need a ticket today.
translation.es: -Sí cabes. Agárralo. -No necesito una multa hoy.

translation.en: - No, but I'm like family. - Oh, honey, there's no such thing.
translation.es: -No, pero casi. -No hay tal cosa.

translation.en: Thought you might need a real shoulder to cry on.
translation.es: Quiere un hombre que te consuele.

translation.en: - Oh, please. Come on. Oscar. - Who the fuck's that?
translation.es: -Por favor. Vámonos. -¿Quién es ese?

translation.en: I said what's happening? What the hell is going on?
translation.es: ¿Qué está pasando? ¿Qué diablos pasa?

translation.en: It's very green here, isn't it? It's, like, so green.
translation.es: Está muy verde aquí. Está tremendamente verde.

translation.en: Like, God, wow, it's like... It's like I'm inside a lime.
translation.es: Siento que estoy dentro de una lima.

translation.en: All this stuff about dogs and things being green.
translation.es: Todo esto de los perros y de las cosas verdes.

translation.en: What are you talking about? I'm fine. I've never been greener.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? Estoy bien. Jamás he estado más verde.

translation.en: - Yeah, right. - I know you were looking.
translation.es: -Sí, claro. -Yo sé que me estabas mirando.

translation.en: - You're going the wrong way, dumbass! - That hurts!
translation.es: -¡Vas en sentido contrario! -¡Eso duele!

translation.en: I got to speak to Elaine. Stop the car.
translation.es: Tengo que hablar con Elaine. Para el auto.

translation.en: - We're gonna be late, fatty! - Damn it!
translation.es: -¡Vamos a llegar tarde, gordinflas! -¡Maldita sea!

translation.en: You got to stop this, Uncle Russell, or you gonna be in a box next.
translation.es: Deténgase o va a acabar en una caja.

translation.en: Who are these people? I don't recognize half of them.
translation.es: ¿Quién es esta gente? No reconozco a casi nadie.

translation.en: It's your family. You don't recognize them from the last funeral?
translation.es: Es tu familia. ¿No la reconoces del último funeral?

translation.en: Probably a friend of Dad's from work.
translation.es: Quizá sea un amigo del trabajo de papá.

translation.en: You know, the funeral looks good. You did a good job.
translation.es: El funeral se ve muy bien. Hiciste un buen trabajo.

translation.en: Are you telling me I got to pay for the whole funeral?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que pague todos los gastos?

translation.en: I'm saying you gonna have to pay for the whole thing now.
translation.es: Necesitas pagar todos los gastos ahora.

translation.en: All right, just for a few months, till I get my next advance.
translation.es: Sólo unos meses, hasta mi siguiente adelanto.

translation.en: Goddamn, man! What the fuck? Jesus Christ!
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea! ¿Qué carajos? ¡Dios mío!

translation.en: We just got to wait for a few more people to come and then we can start.
translation.es: Cuando lleguen unas personas más podemos empezar.

translation.en: I squeezed this job in today because I really wanted to meet you.
translation.es: ...acepté este trabajo hoy porque tenía muchas ganas de conocerte.

translation.en: Listen, I just finished reading Momma's Secret.
translation.es: Acabo de terminar El secreto de mamá.

translation.en: because I'm not supposed to be reading that kind of stuff, you know?
translation.es: ...porque yo no debo leer esa clase de libros.

translation.en: - I can't wait to hear your eulogy. - Actually, I'm doing the eulogy.
translation.es: -Me muero por oír tu elogio. -Yo lo voy a hacer.

translation.en: - Oh, I thought... - Well, Aaron's the oldest, technically.
translation.es: -Yo creía... -Aarón es el mayor, técnicamente.

translation.en: - How's my little Cynthia? - Oh, Duncan.
translation.es: -¿Cómo está mi pequeña Cynthia? -¡Ay, Duncan!

translation.en: I'm just trying to hold it all together.
translation.es: Estoy tratando de mantener la compostura.

translation.en: He was a good husband and a great father to two healthy, strong boys.
translation.es: Fue un buen marido y un papá excelente de dos hijos sanos y fuertes.

translation.en: Why they have decided not to have children of their own
translation.es: Ambos decidieron no tener hijos...

translation.en: Coffee may do many things, Michelle, but it does not bring back the dead.
translation.es: El café podrá hacer muchas cosas, pero no resucita a nadie.

translation.en: I got to go over the speech. Could you look out for Uncle Russell?
translation.es: Necesito repasar el elogio. ¿Cuidas al tío Russell?

translation.en: Look at Martina. Man, that girl is all grown up.
translation.es: La pequeña Martina. Cómo ha crecido.

translation.en: Come on, man. Little Martina? She's, like, in the 12th grade.
translation.es: Martina está en el bachillerato.

translation.en: Yeah, well, she may be in 12th grade, but that ass is in grad school.
translation.es: Estará en el bachillerato, pero su trasero es universitario.

translation.en: - Anyway... - I should go see how she's doing.
translation.es: -En fin... -Voy a ver cómo está.

translation.en: - See if she needs a juice box or something. - Man!
translation.es: A ver si quiere un juguito o algo así.

translation.en: My father was an exceptional man.
translation.es: “Mi papá era un hombre excepcional.

translation.en: I'm so sorry to hear about your dad. He talked about you a lot.
translation.es: Lamento lo de tu papá. Hablaba mucho de ti.

translation.en: Did he ever mention me? I'm sorry. Frank.
translation.es: ¿Nunca me mencionó? Perdón. Soy Frank.

translation.en: Honey. Can I see you for a moment?
translation.es: Corazón, ¿me permites un momento?

translation.en: One second. I got to go, Frank.
translation.es: Un segundo. Me tengo que ir, Frank.

translation.en: Be careful with my shit! Don't bang up the rims.
translation.es: ¡Cuidado con mi silla! ¡No golpees las ruedas!

translation.en: Listen, we still need to finish that thing, remember?
translation.es: Necesitamos hacer esa cosa, ¿te acuerdas?

translation.en: Hey, my father's dead. Put some panties on. I'm trying to help here.
translation.es: -Mi papá está muerto. ¡Ponte calzones! -Te estoy tratando de ayudar.

translation.en: Please, honey, I really wanna make this baby thing happen, so, come on.
translation.es: De verdad quiero tener un bebé.

translation.en: There's a guy down there... Don't look, don't look.
translation.es: Hay un tipo allá abajo...no, no voltees...

translation.en: ...in a black leather jacket who keeps checking me out.
translation.es: ...de saco negro de piel mirándome.

translation.en: - Don't stare, don't stare. - I'm not staring.
translation.es: -¡No lo mires! -No lo estoy mirando.

translation.en: Well, no, but, I mean, he must be a friend of your father's.
translation.es: Debe de ser un amigo de tu papá.

translation.en: Now I got to go and check the food.
translation.es: Tengo que ver cómo va la comida.

translation.en: Hey! Put some panties on before you touch the food.
translation.es: Ponte calzones antes de tocar la comida.

translation.en: Isn't it beautiful? Plus, it sings.
translation.es: ¿No es hermosa? Y además canta.

translation.en: And I'm just warning you right now that you're not gonna like it.
translation.es: Te advierto de una vez que no te va a gustar.

translation.en: - Uncle Duncan. - How are we doing on time?
translation.es: -Tío Duncan. -¿Cómo vamos de tiempo?

translation.en: You know what, as soon as Russell gets here, we'll be ready to go.
translation.es: En cuanto llegue Russell comenzamos.

translation.en: Fine. So, what's this nonsense I hear about Ryan not saying a few words?
translation.es: Muy bien. ¿Cómo es que Ryan no va a decir unas palabras?

translation.en: I offered to do the eulogy, but Aaron's the oldest.
translation.es: Ofrecí hacer el elogio, pero Aarón es el mayor.

translation.en: I'm sure it's gonna be one of a kind.
translation.es: Estoy seguro que va a ser único.

translation.en: I mean, I'm sure you'll do fine, Aaron, but with Ryan being the writer in the family.
translation.es: Seguro te saldrá bien, pero Ryan es el escritor de la familia.

translation.en: Well, we all write checks. Your brother is an author.
translation.es: Todos escribimos cheques. Tu hermano es un autor.

translation.en: Uncle Duncan, I have to ask you a question.
translation.es: Te tengo que hacer una pregunta.

translation.en: Well, she's not actually related to us or anything, is she?
translation.es: No tenemos ningún parentesco, ¿o sí?

translation.en: No. No, no, no. She's just a family friend.
translation.es: No, es una amiga de la familia.

translation.en: - What do you mean, it's not Valium? - Well, it's interesting.
translation.es: -¿Cómo que no es Valium? -Pues, es interesante.

translation.en: What you thought was Valium is actually not Valium.
translation.es: Lo que pensabas que era Valium... no es Valium.

translation.en: - Oh, my God. This isn't funny. - No, it's not, it's not funny at all.
translation.es: -Esto no es chistoso. -No es nada chistoso.

translation.en: I'm a pharmacology student, Laney.
translation.es: Soy estudiante de farmacología.

translation.en: And first of all, who just waltzes up in someone's apartment
translation.es: ¿Y quién llega al apartamento de otro...

translation.en: - Well, I thought it was Valium. - Clearly.
translation.es: -Creí que era Valium. -Obviamente.

translation.en: Don't let him spend too much time talking to any one person.
translation.es: No lo dejes hablar demasiado con una sola persona.

translation.en: Okay, Oscar? Honey. Come back. Where are you going?
translation.es: ¿Óscar? ¿Corazón? Regresa. ¿A dónde vas?

translation.en: It's gonna be your head in a minute. Hurry up, we gonna be late for the funeral.
translation.es: En un minuto será tu cabeza. Vamos a llegar tarde.

translation.en: My scrotum is gonna look like a duffle bag
translation.es: Mi escroto va a parecer una bolsa...

translation.en: with two bowling balls in it when I get up this hill with you.
translation.es: ...con dos bolas de bolos cuando suba la colina.

translation.en: Not too bad, considering we're at my brother's funeral.
translation.es: Bastante bien, dado que es el funeral de mi hermano.

translation.en: - I'm not worried about you. - Oscar.
translation.es: -No estoy preocupado. -Óscar, Óscar.

translation.en: - So, I see you brought your friend. - He's not my friend, he's my boyfriend.
translation.es: -Veo que trajiste a tu amigo. -No es mi amigo, es mi novio.

translation.en: - I'm extremely sorry, sir. - Derek. Glad you could make it.
translation.es: -Lo siento mucho, señor. -Me alegro de que viniste.

translation.en: and I'll tell you all about it, every last detail.
translation.es: ...para que le explique los detalles.

translation.en: I'm so sorry about Uncle Edward.
translation.es: Lamento mucho lo de tío Edward.

translation.en: - We're gonna miss him so much. - And Jeff, sneakers.
translation.es: -Lo vamos a extrañar. -Y Jeff, con tenis.

translation.en: He bought them for me. He bought them for me.
translation.es: Él me los compró. Él me los compró.

translation.en: Oh, gosh. Aunt Cynthia, this is Oscar.
translation.es: Tía Cynthia, te presento a Óscar.

translation.en: - It's nice to see you, too, Aunt Cynthia. - So sorry, ma'am, so sorry.
translation.es: -Igualmente, tía Cynthia. -Lo siento mucho, señora.

translation.en: - Did you just fart, old man? - Put your butt in it.
translation.es: -¿Se echó un pedo? -¡Métele fuerza!

translation.en: I heard about the engagement, Elaine.
translation.es: Me enteré de que te comprometiste.

translation.en: and I would appreciate it if you kept your mouth shut.
translation.es: Te agradecería que te callaras la boca.

translation.en: My father was an exceptional man.
translation.es: Mi padre era un hombre excepcional.

translation.en: 1938 was an exceptional year. In 1938...
translation.es: 1938 fue un año excepcional. En 1938...

translation.en: Actually, there is something I'd like to talk to you about, if you have a minute.
translation.es: Quisiera hablar contigo si tienes un minuto.

translation.en: Quit crying. You got snot all over my collar and everything.
translation.es: ¡No lloriquees! ¡Me llenaste de mocos!

translation.en: What's wrong with the stairs? Just get me up the stairs. Hurry up!
translation.es: ¿Qué tienen? ¡Súbeme! ¡Apúrate!

translation.en: I got to take your old ass up these stairs?
translation.es: ¿Tengo que subir su culo viejo?

translation.en: - So, you go to a lot of funerals? - No, this is my first one.
translation.es: -¿Vas a muchos funerales? -No, este es el primero.

translation.en: I want our wedding to be like this.
translation.es: Quiero que nuestra boda sea así.

translation.en: You might meet the man of your dreams at this one, huh?
translation.es: Quizá conozcas al hombre de tus sueños aquí.

translation.en: I think my uncle just got here, and we're running a little late.
translation.es: Mi tío acaba de llegar y ya nos atrasamos.

translation.en: Told you about breathing on my neck, too. Come on.
translation.es: Te dije que no me respiraras en el cuello.

translation.en: - I'm seeing double. - Just sit down.
translation.es: -Estoy viendo doble. -Siéntate.

translation.en: - Get up. - I got to get my electrolytes up.
translation.es: Necesito recuperar electrolitos.

translation.en: Could you kindly take your seats? We'd like to begin the service.
translation.es: Siéntense, por favor. Vamos a comenzar el servicio.

translation.en: Watch out now. Watch out now. I'm family.
translation.es: Con cuidado, con cuidado. Soy de la familia.

translation.en: God damn it. You got old people here.
translation.es: Maldita sea. Hay viejos presentes.

translation.en: we are gathered here to mourn the passing of a fine man...
translation.es: ...estamos reunidos para llorar la muerte de un gran hombre...

translation.en: Elaine, I know you don't think I'm part of this family.
translation.es: Sé que no me consideras de la familia...

translation.en: Yeah, but when you dissed me back there, I had Uncle Russell with me in the car.
translation.es: Cuando ocupaste mi lugar tenía al tío Russell en el auto.

translation.en: You took my parking space. I had to push him up a hill by myself.
translation.es: Tuve que subir la colina empujándolo yo solo.

translation.en: Norman, you poke me one more time, I'm gonna kick your ass.
translation.es: Si me vuelves a picar, te voy a dar una paliza.

translation.en: - What's going on? - She took my parking spot, Aaron.
translation.es: -¿Qué pasa? -Me quitó el lugar para estacionar.

translation.en: Parking spot? My father's dead. Act right.
translation.es: ¿El lugar para estacionar? Mi papá se murió. ¡Compórtate!

translation.en: Then Jonathan and David made a covenant,
translation.es: “Y luego Jonathan y David hicieron un pacto

translation.en: because he loved him as his own soul.
translation.es: porque lo quería como a su propia alma.

translation.en: And Jonathan stripped himself of the robe that was upon him,
translation.es: Y Jonathan se quitó su túnica...

translation.en: and gave it to David, and his garments,
translation.es: ...y se la dio a David, con todas sus prendas...

translation.en: even to his sword, and to his bow, and to his girdle.
translation.es: ...incluyendo su espada, su arco y su cinto”.

translation.en: And now we'll hear a word from Edward's son, Aaron, Ryan's older brother.
translation.es: Ahora hablará Aarón, el hermano mayor de Ryan.

translation.en: Only by a couple of months. We was actually born the same year.
translation.es: Sólo por un par de meses. Nacimos el mismo año.

translation.en: - Last chance. - I got it. I got it.
translation.es: -Última oportunidad. -Yo puedo.

translation.en: My father was an exceptional man.
translation.es: Mi padre era un hombre excepcional.

translation.en: In 1938, the number one song was Shortnin' Bread.
translation.es: En 1938, la canción más popular era “Torta Dulce”.

translation.en: Mama's little baby love shortnin', shortnin'
translation.es: Al bebito de mamá Le encanta la torta dulce

translation.en: Mama's little baby love shortnin' bread
translation.es: Al bebito de mamá Le encanta la dulce torta

translation.en: Also in 1938, Time magazine's Man of the Year was Adolf Hitler.
translation.es: También en 1938, el hombre del año de Time fue Hitler.

translation.en: I bet you they wished they could have that one back.
translation.es: Seguro quieren poder retractarse.

translation.en: One thing my father loved to do was watch the Discovery Channel.
translation.es: A mi papá le encantaba ver el Canal de Ciencias.

translation.en: I guess you could call my mother a real Shark Week widow.
translation.es: Mi mamá era una fanática de la “Semana de Tiburones”.

translation.en: Anything to do with sharks or wild boar or the dung beetle,
translation.es: Cualquier programa sobre tiburones o jabalíes o escarabajos...

translation.en: - this always fascinated him. - Did you just see that?
translation.es: -...siempre le fascinaba. -¿Viste eso?

translation.en: - He really loved The Golden Girls. - See what?
translation.es: -Le encantaban “Las Chicas Doradas”. -¿Que si vi qué?

translation.en: And sometimes I'd say, Dad, you wanna go out? And he'd go...
translation.es: A veces le decía: “¿Papá, quieres salir?”

translation.en: He's alive. There's something alive in there.
translation.es: ¡Está vivo! Les tienes que decir.

translation.en: - Someone's alive in there, trying to get out. - Need some help?
translation.es: -Alguien se quiere salir. -¿Te puedo ayudar?

translation.en: What the hell is wrong with you people? The coffin's moving.
translation.es: ¿Qué les pasa? ¡El ataúd se está moviendo!

translation.en: - No, I just need to show you, he's alive. - Elaine, do something.
translation.es: Necesito enseñarles que está vivo.

translation.en: Aaron, you the oldest. Go see what the fuck is going on.
translation.es: Tú eres el mayor. Ve a ver qué está pasando.

translation.en: - When is this funeral gonna happen? - It's gonna happen later, honey.
translation.es: -¿Cuándo va a ser el funeral? -Va a ser más tarde, corazón.

translation.en: - You need to understand that this is... - You sorry? You sorry?
translation.es: -Necesitas entender que esto es... -¿Lo lamentas?

translation.en: My father's sprawled out on the floor like fucking Screamin' Jay Hawkins,
translation.es: ¡Mi papá está tirado en el piso como Jay Hawkins...

translation.en: - but it's okay, because you're sorry! - I'm so...
translation.es: ...pero está bien porque lo lamentas!

translation.en: - The coffin was moving. I... - Is he talking to me?
translation.es: -¡El ataúd se movió! -¿Me está hablando a mí?

translation.en: No, he's not talking to you. Listen to me, Aaron. Go back inside.
translation.es: No, no está hablándote a ti. Escucha, Aarón. Regresa allá dentro.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, can make it up to me at my father's next funeral!
translation.es: ¡Lo arreglas en el próximo funeral de papá!

translation.en: I will not have sex with you right now!
translation.es: ¡No voy a hacer el amor contigo ahora!

translation.en: - I wasn't going to ask you that. - I'm sorry, what were you gonna ask me?
translation.es: -No te iba a preguntar eso. -¿Qué me ibas a preguntar?

translation.en: - Michelle, I'm sorry. - No, it's okay.
translation.es: -Michelle, lo siento. -Está bien.

translation.en: I can't believe you brought this maniac. I never want to see him again.
translation.es: ¿Cómo trajiste a este loco? ¡No lo quiero volver a ver!

translation.en: This isn't what Oscar's normally like, you know that.
translation.es: Óscar no es así normalmente. Tú lo sabes.

translation.en: - Medication? - I gave him a Valium
translation.es: -¿Medicamentos? -Le di un Valium...

translation.en: - and he's having a very bad reaction to it. - Valium? That is not a Valium high.
translation.es: -...y tuvo una reacción mala. -¡Eso no es por un Valium!

translation.en: Your mother was on Valium for 40 years and she never knocked over a coffin.
translation.es: Tu mamá tomó Valium durante 40 años y nunca tiró un ataúd.

translation.en: - Dad, stop it. - This is not over.
translation.es: -Papá, ya para. -Esto no se ha acabado.

translation.en: You're gonna pay for that, I promise you!
translation.es: ¡La vas a pagar, te lo prometo!

translation.en: - Thanks, Jeff. - No problem, cuz.
translation.es: -Gracias, Jeff. -De nada, primo.

translation.en: But everything is now being put back into its proper place,
translation.es: Todo está de nuevo en su lugar.

translation.en: The catfish nuggets are to die for.
translation.es: Las croquetas de pescado son deliciosas.

translation.en: Hey. That must have been horrible for you.
translation.es: Eso debió de ser terrible para ti.

translation.en: Maybe we should go outside, get some air?
translation.es: ¿Vamos afuera a tomar el fresco?

translation.en: Hey, bigshot. I read your last book there.
translation.es: Oye, celebridad. Leí tu último libro...

translation.en: - Black Hurt. - That's cool. Thanks, Uncle Russ.
translation.es: -...Dolor negro. -Fantástico. Gracias, tío Russ.

translation.en: I'm not giving you a compliment, you arrogant bastard.
translation.es: No era un cumplido, desgraciado arrogante.

translation.en: What a load of bullshit. I wouldn't wipe my ass with it.
translation.es: Qué montón de idioteces. Ni me limpiaría el culo con él.

translation.en: - Hey, Aaron. Yo, you all right, man? - I'm holding up.
translation.es: -Oye, Aarón. ¿Estás bien? -Lo estoy sobrellevando.

translation.en: the way your father fell out his coffin like a dead fish.
translation.es: Se cayó como un pescado muerto.

translation.en: He was like... I was like, Damn! Man.
translation.es: Se cayó, ¡pum! Yo dije: “¡caray!”. Dios mío.

translation.en: - I got to go somewhere, okay? - You're right. I'm sorry.
translation.es: -Necesito ir a un lado. -Claro. Perdón.

translation.en: You never know when your room is gonna be ready. You never know.
translation.es: Nunca sabes cuándo va a estar listo tu cuarto. Uno no sabe.

translation.en: And I'm like scared because I got this rash on my wrist,
translation.es: Tengo miedo porque tengo una erupción...

translation.en: I know what that look like, but this is something different and I'm just scared.
translation.es: Esa la conozco. Esta es diferente y tengo miedo.

translation.en: - I don't know, man. - Well, just show it to Uncle Duncan.
translation.es: -No sé. -Enséñasela al tío Duncan.

translation.en: Maybe we're standing still and the coffin's moving.
translation.es: Quizá nosotros estemos quietos y el ataúd se esté moviendo.

translation.en: - God, Elaine, am I losing my mind? - No, you're not losing your mind, honey.
translation.es: -¿Me estoy volviendo loco? -No te estás volviendo loco.

translation.en: - Why are my hands so big? - Oscar. Look at me. Focus.
translation.es: -¡Qué manotas tengo! -Óscar. Mírame. Concéntrate.

translation.en: Okay, good. Because I have to tell you something.
translation.es: Qué bien. Porque tengo que decirte algo.

translation.en: Remember that Valium that I gave you earlier?
translation.es: ¿Te acuerdas del Valium que te di?

translation.en: Well, it turns out that it wasn't really Valium. Not completely.
translation.es: Resulta que no era realmente Valium. No completamente.

translation.en: Hey, Uncle Duncan! Miss Cynthia, Michelle.
translation.es: ¡Tío Duncan! Sra. Cynthia, Michelle.

translation.en: I got this thing on my hand and it's been there for weeks,
translation.es: Tengo esta cosa en la mano desde hace semanas...

translation.en: and I was just wondering what you think it might be.
translation.es: ...y pensaba que quizás sabría qué puede ser.

translation.en: I mean... Why? I don't have sickle cell anemia or nothing, right?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? No tengo anemia drepanocítica, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, it looks like a pigment mutation.
translation.es: No, parece una mutación de pigmento.

translation.en: You mean like the Incredible Hulk or something?
translation.es: ¿Como la que sufre la Mole o algo así?

translation.en: I'm a black man, I'm sensitive, I'd be turning green over every little thing.
translation.es: Soy sensible. ¡Me volvería verde por cualquier cosita!

translation.en: Me getting mail from child support, That not Hulk baby.
translation.es: ...las cartas de chicas embarazadas. “Ese no es de la Mole”.

translation.en: Hulk take blood tests on Maury Povich.
translation.es: ¡Me harían pruebas en vivo en la TV!

translation.en: You're probably just allergic to something. Maybe shellfish or nuts.
translation.es: Debes de tener alergias, quizá a mariscos o a las nueces.

translation.en: - Nuts? Well, what nut mutates? - I don't know. Now excuse me.
translation.es: -¿A las nueces? ¿Qué nueces mutan? -No sé. Con tu permiso.

translation.en: Somebody gave me hypoallergenic drugs?
translation.es: ¿Me dieron drogas hipoalergénicas?

translation.en: - Elaine, Elaine, did you tell him? - I just did.
translation.es: -¿Le dijiste? -Le acabo de decir.

translation.en: - How you feeling, big guy? - I've been drugged.
translation.es: -¿Cómo te sientes, grandote? -Me drogaron.

translation.en: - Yeah, yeah, a little bit. Hey, listen... - I've been drugged by you.
translation.es: -Sí, un poco. -¡Tú me drogaste!

translation.en: - Let him go! Oh, my God. - How long does it last?
translation.es: -¡Suéltalo! -¿Cuánto tiempo dura?

translation.en: - Like eight hours? - Eight hours, fuck!
translation.es: -Unas 8 horas. -¡Ocho horas! ¡Carajo!

translation.en: - Jeffrey, this is all your fault. - This is your fault. You gave it to him.
translation.es: -Esto es culpa tuya. -No, tuya. Tú se la diste.

translation.en: Get back or I will blow your head off.
translation.es: Échate para atrás o te vuelo la cabeza.

translation.en: - Elaine? I can't find the pill bottle. - Can you just...
translation.es: No encuentro la botella de pastillas.

translation.en: - Oscar, open the door. - Lasts up to eight hours.
translation.es: -Abre la puerta. -Dura hasta 8 horas.

translation.en: - Oscar, open the door, sweetie. - It's already been five minutes.
translation.es: -¡Abre la puerta, corazón! -Ya pasaron 5 minutos.

translation.en: Motherfucker! Five minutes? Oh, shit!
translation.es: ¡Hijo de puta! ¡Cinco minutos! ¡Mierda!

translation.en: why don't you go get something to eat? We're gonna start pretty soon. Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no come algo? Vamos a empezar muy pronto.

translation.en: Grief does strange things to people, doesn't it?
translation.es: La aflicción le hace cosas raras a la gente, ¿no?

translation.en: - Could we just do this... - Is there someplace private we could go?
translation.es: -¿Lo podemos hacer en otra...? -¿Podemos ir a un lugar privado?

translation.en: - Sorry. - Just like your brother.
translation.es: -Disculpa. -Igual que tu hermano.

translation.en: Actually, I was writing before my brother.
translation.es: Yo empecé a escribir antes que mi hermano.

translation.en: I got a couple of pieces published in Jet. One about hypertension.
translation.es: Me publicaron un par de artículos en Jet. Uno sobre la hipertensión.

translation.en: and now I'm working mainly as a tax accountant.
translation.es: Ahora soy contador de impuestos.

translation.en: Well, then, you must be very proud of Ryan. Getting all of his novels published.
translation.es: Debes de estar orgulloso de Ryan. Le publican todas sus novelas.

translation.en: - That's nice, that's nice. - Spent a lot of time together.
translation.es: -Qué bien, qué bien. -Pasamos mucho tiempo juntos.

translation.en: I have some photos I want to show you. Few snaps of us.
translation.es: Quiero enseñarte unas fotos. De nosotros dos.

translation.en: That's me and your dad at Venice Beach, Muscle Beach.
translation.es: Ahí estamos en Venice Beach, con los levanta pesas.

translation.en: And here we are in West Hollywood, at the Halloween parade.
translation.es: Y aquí estamos en el desfile de Noche de Brujas.

translation.en: I don't know if you've ever been, but what a spectacle that is.
translation.es: No sé si alguna vez has ido. Es todo un espectáculo.

translation.en: And here we are at the premiere of Dreamgirls.
translation.es: Y aquí estamos en el estreno de “Soñadoras”.

translation.en: I was dressed as Deena and your father just had to be Effie.
translation.es: Yo me vestí de Deena y tu papá tenía que ser Effie.

translation.en: So, how exactly did you know my father?
translation.es: ¿De dónde conocías precisamente a mi papá?

translation.en: You think you can come in here and just slander my dad's name
translation.es: ¿Crees que puedes venir y manchar el nombre de mi papá...

translation.en: by showing me a couple of pictures of you guys going to see Dreamgirls?
translation.es: ...enseñándome unas fotos de Uds. en “Soñadoras”?

translation.en: So what? I've seen Dreamgirls two, three times.
translation.es: He visto “Soñadoras” 2 ó 3 veces.

translation.en: I guess he would've told you himself, but he wasn't sure how you'd react.
translation.es: Él te lo hubiera dicho. No sabía cómo ibas a reaccionar.

translation.en: No. And there's no reason she has to.
translation.es: No. Y no tiene por qué saberlo.

translation.en: Just as long as I get what's owed to me.
translation.es: Mientras me den lo que me deben.

translation.en: Your father and I were lovers and he left me absolutely nothing in his will.
translation.es: Éramos amantes. No me dejó nada en su testamento.

translation.en: I will tell you how it makes me feel. Cheap.
translation.es: Te diré cómo me siento. Como basura.

translation.en: - Like some cheap piece of ass. - What do you want?
translation.es: -¡Como una ramera barata! -¿Qué quieres?

translation.en: What I want is a lot, but I'm not asking you for what I want.
translation.es: Quiero mucho, pero no te estoy pidiendo lo que quiero.

translation.en: Are you smoking meth? I'm not giving you $30,000.
translation.es: ¿Estás fumando meth? ¡Yo no te voy a dar $30.000!

translation.en: I'm trying to buy a house! I'm trying to have a kid!
translation.es: ¡Quiero una casa, quiero un hijo!

translation.en: Now, listen, your father made me a promise to take care of me.
translation.es: Tu papá me prometió que me iba a cuidar.

translation.en: I made certain sacrifices to keep him happy.
translation.es: Hice ciertos sacrificios para mantenerlo contento.

translation.en: Now, I don't want to, but I will show these photos to your mother.
translation.es: No quiero, pero le voy a enseñar las fotos a tu mamá.

translation.en: Oh, Aaron. I was just telling George here how
translation.es: Ay, Aarón. Le estaba diciendo a George...

translation.en: your father used to make us all go skinny- dipping.
translation.es: ...tu papá nos hacía nadar desnudos.

translation.en: - Isn't that funny? - Hilarious.
translation.es: -Qué chistoso, ¿no? -Me mata de la risa.

translation.en: - Well, maybe your husband will know. - Wait! Wait! Aaron! Aaron!
translation.es: -Quizá tu esposo sepa. -¡Aarón! ¡Aarón!

translation.en: Say, Elaine, what are you doing after the funeral?
translation.es: ¿Qué vas a hacer después del funeral?

translation.en: I got Usher tickets, front row, Staples Center.
translation.es: Tengo boletos para ver a Usher.

translation.en: Well, no, not yet, but I can get them like that.
translation.es: Todavía no, pero los puedo tener.

translation.en: Now, that's not seeing New York. You got to come visit. Just hang out.
translation.es: Eso no es ver Nueva York. Ven de visita a divertirte.

translation.en: - When's your birthday? - I turned 18 last week.
translation.es: -¿Cuándo cumples años? -La semana pasada cumplí 18.

translation.en: You know, I want you to get yourself on a bus
translation.es: Quiero que te subas en un autobús...

translation.en: and come visit me in New York this year. Can you do that?
translation.es: ...y me vengas a visitar. ¿Puedes hacer eso?

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I'm talking about. And I got all kind of snacks for you.
translation.es: Sí, así me gusta. Y tengo toda clase de cosas ricas.

translation.en: - Really? - You like Sugar Daddies?
translation.es: -¿Sí? -¿Te gustan los palitos de chocolate?

translation.en: - I really need to talk to you. - Aaron, give me five minutes, okay?
translation.es: -De verdad necesito hablarte. -Dame 5 minutos.

translation.en: Martina, could you excuse us? We've really got to talk about something.
translation.es: ¿Nos disculpas? Tenemos que hablar de algo.

translation.en: Hey, SpongeBob is on. All right, talk to you later.
translation.es: Están pasando Bob Esponja. Bueno, hablamos luego.

translation.en: Remember the guy that came by a little earlier, that we didn't recognize?
translation.es: ¿Te acuerdas del tipo que vino antes, que no reconocimos?

translation.en: he came by the study, and he showed me some pictures of him and Dad.
translation.es: Pasó al estudio y me enseñó unas fotos de él con papá.

translation.en: - what's wrong with that? - Pictures of him and Dad together.
translation.es: -¿Qué tiene de malo? -Fotos de papá y él...juntos.

translation.en: - So, we playing 20 questions now or what? - He was Dad's lover.
translation.es: -¿Estamos jugando a las 20 preguntas? -Era amante de papá.

translation.en: He showed me some pictures of him and Dad doing stuff.
translation.es: Me enseñó fotos de él y papá haciendo cosas.

translation.en: I don't believe that. My father's not gay.
translation.es: No te creo. Mi papá no era gay.

translation.en: Matter of fact, he's so straight, he makes me seem gay.
translation.es: Era tan macho que hace que yo parezca gay.

translation.en: I don't know what she sees in that poser that she doesn't see in me.
translation.es: ¿Qué le ve a ese impostor que no tenga yo?

translation.en: - Seems serious, don't it? - Of course it is, it's my life.
translation.es: -Parece serio, ¿no? -Claro, es mi vida.

translation.en: - Me. Pigment mutation? - Right.
translation.es: -Lo mío. ¿Mutación de pigmento? -Ah, cierto.

translation.en: Well, maybe it's vitiligo, that thing Michael Jackson had on his balls.
translation.es: ¿Será “vitiglio”?, lo que Michael Jackson tenía en sus pelotas.

translation.en: I don't know what Michael Jackson had on his balls.
translation.es: No sé qué tenía Michael Jackson en sus pelotas.

translation.en: - Hey. Try this cake. It might have nuts in it. - So?
translation.es: -Prueba este pastel. Quizá tenga nueces. -¿Y?

translation.en: Elaine's dad said I might just be allergic to nuts.
translation.es: El papá de Elaine dijo que puede ser alergia.

translation.en: So, don't eat nuts. Put the fork down. Don't eat it.
translation.es: No comas nueces. Baja el tenedor.

translation.en: That's what I do when I'm stressed. I eat.
translation.es: ¡Eso hago con el estrés! ¡Yo como!

translation.en: You ain't gonna eat when your hand falls off, papa.
translation.es: No vas a comer cuando se te caiga la mano.

translation.en: Just try the cake for me. See if it has nuts in it, please?
translation.es: Prueba el pastel, dime si tiene nueces.

translation.en: Elaine's driving me crazy, and you're not helping.
translation.es: Elaine me está volviendo loco. No me estás ayudando.

translation.en: Hey, fathead. Quit slopping down food for a second. Make me a plate.
translation.es: Oye, gordo. Deja de atragantarte y prepárame un plato.

translation.en: I'm gonna wash my hands, and make you a dynamite plate.
translation.es: Me voy a lavar las manos y a prepararle un buen plato.

translation.en: I know you like hot sauce on your collard greens. That's...
translation.es: Le gustan las berzas con salsa picante.

translation.en: Have you seen a little pill, pill bottle with some Valium in it?
translation.es: ¿Has visto una botellita con Valiums?

translation.en: Shit tastes like it got nuts in it. Shit.
translation.es: Sabe a que tiene nueces. Mierda.

translation.en: - I'm sure we'll start again soon. - Dr. Barnes! Dr. Barnes!
translation.es: -Seguro vamos a continuar pronto. -¡Dr. Barnes!

translation.en: - Let's go back inside. - Soon. I just need a moment alone.
translation.es: -Vámonos para dentro. -Necesito un momento sola.

translation.en: - Dr. Barnes, just one quick... - Excuse me.
translation.es: -Dr. Barnes, sólo un... -Disculpa.

translation.en: You hanging in there? Your macaroni is superb.
translation.es: ¿Se siente bien? Sus macarrones están deliciosos.

translation.en: Six different cheeses. He looked good in that box.
translation.es: Seis quesos diferentes. Se veía bien.

translation.en: The rigor mortis set in well. You know, except for that left hand.
translation.es: El rigor mortis no lo afectó. Excepto por la mano izquierda.

translation.en: You might just wanna throw an oven mitt or something on there. Yeah.
translation.es: Póngale un guante de cocina o algo.

translation.en: Looked like Colin Powell. Looked just like a Republican.
translation.es: Parecía Colin Powell. Parecía un republicano.

translation.en: 'Cause sometimes they take the shoes right off their feet in the funeral home, right?
translation.es: A veces les quitan los zapatos en las funerarias.

translation.en: - Especially if they're gators. - Norman. Just...
translation.es: -Y más los de cocodrilo. -¿Norman?

translation.en: - Excuse me. - Sorry, Miss Cynthia.
translation.es: -Disculpa. -Perdóneme, Sra. Cynthia.

translation.en: If we don't get him the money right now, he's gonna start showing Mom the pictures.
translation.es: Si no le damos el dinero, le enseñará las fotos a mamá.

translation.en: - Let me think. All right? Let me think. - Think, think.
translation.es: -Déjame pensar, déjame pensar. -Piensa, piensa.

translation.en: - You gonna have to pay him, then. - That's your big idea?
translation.es: -Le vas a tener que pagar. -¿Esa es tu gran idea?

translation.en: Don't you have a savings or a nest egg? A damn piggy bank?
translation.es: ¿No tienes ahorros? ¿Ni una maldita alcancía?

translation.en: Aaron, I'm in debt up to my ass. I'm broke, man. It's Hammertime, okay?
translation.es: Estoy en deudas hasta el cuello. Estoy quebrado. Me va a pasar lo que a Hammer.

translation.en: If I don't get some money soon, I'm gonna have to do a damn reality show.
translation.es: Si no consigo dinero, tendré que hacer un reality show.

translation.en: Okay, so, I gotta pay for the funeral, the catering, and all this other shit,
translation.es: Tengo que pagar el funeral, la comida y todo lo demás...

translation.en: and now I gotta pull $30,000 out of my ass?
translation.es: ...¿y ahora tengo que sacar $30.000 del aire?

translation.en: - You know, he's your dad, too. - Yeah, but you the oldest.
translation.es: -También es tu papá. -Pero tú eres el mayor.

translation.en: - By nine months, as you love to point out. - Doesn't matter.
translation.es: -Por 9 meses, como te encanta decir. -No importa.

translation.en: Besides, you been living off of Mom and Dad long enough.
translation.es: Mamá y papá ya te han mantenido bastante.

translation.en: You must've saved some money. What? You haven't paid rent in a long time.
translation.es: Debes de tener ahorros. Hace mucho que no pagas renta.

translation.en: Hey, hey, I've been living with them, not off them.
translation.es: He vivido con ellos, no de ellos.

translation.en: Well, if we both got money issues, what can we do? Fuck him! Fuck...
translation.es: Si los dos tenemos problemas de dinero, al carajo con él.

translation.en: - Are you okay there, friend? - Hey, fuck no.
translation.es: -¿Está Ud. bien, amigo? -Claro que no.

translation.en: My nephew's dead, and the little bastards ate all the potato salad. Shit.
translation.es: Mi sobrino se murió y no queda ensalada.

translation.en: Listen, I think we're just about ready to start that service again.
translation.es: Ya estamos listos para reanudar el servicio.

translation.en: Hey, hey, baby, what's going on? Is everything okay?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa, nene? ¿Está todo bien?

translation.en: No, we're not gonna be able to move out as soon as we hoped. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.es: No nos vamos a poder mudar pronto. Perdóname.

translation.en: Wait. Listen to me. Hello? What are you talking about?
translation.es: Espera. Escúchame. ¿Hola? ¿De qué estás hablando?

translation.en: You know I wouldn't have said it unless I had a good reason.
translation.es: No lo hubiera dicho sin tener una buena razón.

translation.en: - Okay, fine, so what's the reason? - Aaron, we don't have time right now.
translation.es: -¿Y cuál es la razón? -No tenemos tiempo ahora. Vámonos.

translation.en: but you have some explaining to do. And I mean it!
translation.es: ...pero me debes una explicación.

translation.en: - Well, it was on the coffee table. - And what's that supposed to mean?
translation.es: -Estaba en la mesa. -¿Y eso qué tiene?

translation.en: Well, when someone leaves something on a coffee table,
translation.es: Cuando alguien deja algo en una mesa...

translation.en: it's assumed it's for everybody. That's pretty standard.
translation.es: ...se supone que es para todos. Es lo aceptado.

translation.en: - Can we get to the point here? - Fine by me.
translation.es: -¿Vamos al grano? -Por mí, perfecto.

translation.en: So, I write the check, you give us the photos,
translation.es: Yo escribo el cheque, tú nos das las fotos...

translation.en: - What? - The novel. It's a first draft.
translation.es: -¿Qué? -La novela. ¿Es el primer borrador?

translation.en: I tried writing once. Didn't work for me, either.
translation.es: Yo traté de escribir una vez. Tampoco me salió a mí.

translation.en: I think it's like a gift. Either you have it or you don't.
translation.es: Creo que es un don. O lo tienes o no.

translation.en: I mean, your brother being a bestselling author and all.
translation.es: ...tu hermano vende best-sellers.

translation.en: Your father and I read Rhonda's Tiny Box cover to cover together.
translation.es: Tu papá y yo leímos La cajita de Rhonda, de principio a fin.

translation.en: We loved it. He was so proud of you.
translation.es: Nos encantó. Él estaba muy orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: - That's it. I can't do it. - Whoa, whoa, whoa, Aaron. Aaron, no, no.
translation.es: -Se acabó. No lo puedo hacer. -Alto. Aarón, no.

translation.en: There is no way in the world I'm giving this guy my hard- earned money. No.
translation.es: Por ningún motivo le voy a dar el dinero que he ganado.

translation.en: Now, I'll pay you back as soon as my advance comes in.
translation.es: Te pago cuando me llegue mi adelanto.

translation.en: He picks today, the day of our father's funeral.
translation.es: Escogió hoy, el día del funeral de nuestro padre.

translation.en: And then on top of that, he insults my book? No! No!
translation.es: ¿Y además insulta mi libro? ¡No!

translation.en: - But he got pictures. - So what? I don't give a fuck what he's got.
translation.es: Pero tiene fotos. ¿Y qué? Me importa un carajo lo que tenga.

translation.en: He can show them to the world. He can put them on Facebook for all I care.
translation.es: Que se las enseñe al mundo. Que las ponga en Facebook.

translation.en: Fine. But this is on your head.
translation.es: Está bien. Pero va a pesar sobre tu conciencia.

translation.en: - No, no, no. Let's discuss this for a minute. - There is nothing to discuss.
translation.es: -Vamos a discutir esto. -No hay nada que discutir.

translation.en: You gonna bring a gat to a funeral?
translation.es: ¿Trajiste una pistola a un funeral?

translation.en: - You got any rope? Any duct tape? - Hey, what do I look like, a serial killer?
translation.es: -¿Tienes una cuerda? ¿Cinta adhesiva? -¿Parezco un asesino?

translation.en: I don't just keep rope and duct tape in my pocket.
translation.es: ¡No traigo una cuerda ni una cinta!

translation.en: - What the fuck am I gonna do with my tie? - Stuff it in his mouth.
translation.es: -¿Qué hago con ella? -¡En la boca!

translation.en: All right, first key... First key to war is to cut off communication.
translation.es: En la guerra lo primero es cortar comunicación.

translation.en: All right, now, grab that curtain thing. Hurry up. Grab the curtain thing.
translation.es: Ahora agarra esa cosa de las cortinas. ¡Apúrate!

translation.en: Tie his legs. Come on, Aaron, damn!
translation.es: Amárrale las piernas. ¡Apúrate, Aarón!

translation.en: - Feel like I'm in a fucking rodeo! - Yeah, yeah. Okay, now get his hands. Shit.
translation.es: -¡Siento que estoy en un rodeo! -¡Ahora amárrale las manos!

translation.en: God damn. Strong, ain't he? Damn it, do I gotta do everything?
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea! Es fuerte, ¿no? ¿Yo tengo que hacer todo?

translation.en: You know what was in that cake? What's going on? Who's that dude?
translation.es: ¿Saben qué había en ese pastel? ¿Quién es él?

translation.en: Norman, come in and shut the damn door. Come on, Aaron, tie it.
translation.es: Entra y cierra la puerta. Aarón, amárralo.

translation.en: You know what? I just found some Valium outside.
translation.es: ¿Saben qué? Encontré unos Valiums afuera.

translation.en: - You think this will calm him down? - Good. Yeah, yeah, give him some.
translation.es: -¿Creen que esto lo calme? -Sí, dale unos.

translation.en: I learned that procedure at Boys and Girls High School.
translation.es: Aprendí eso en el bachillerato.

translation.en: - Come on. - Here, buddy, this'll make you feel calm.
translation.es: Toma, amiguito. Esto te va a calmar.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Look at that. You gonna be fine, my friend.
translation.es: Mira eso. Te vas a poner bien, amigo.

translation.en: - Did you guys happen to see a little... - Come, come in, Jeff, come in.
translation.es: -¿No vieron un...? -Pasa, Jeff.

translation.en: Norman, I told you to lock the damn door.
translation.es: Te dije que cerraras con llave.

translation.en: - What's... What's going on? - He's having a seizure.
translation.es: -¿Qué pasa? -Es un ataque de epilepsia.

translation.en: - Yeah. So, why is he all tied up? - We don't want him to swallow his tongue.
translation.es: -¿Por qué lo tienen amarrado? -Para que no se trague la lengua.

translation.en: No. That's part of the medical procedure.
translation.es: Es parte del procedimiento médico.

translation.en: He's blackmailing you? Over what?
translation.es: ¿Los está chantajeando? ¿Con qué?

translation.en: If I could tell you, it wouldn't be blackmail, now, would it?
translation.es: Si te pudiera decir, no sería chantaje, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Hey, look, just trust us. He's the bad guy. Okay? We'll explain it to you later.
translation.es: Créenos, él es el malo. Luego te explicamos.

translation.en: Yeah, what are we gonna do, Ryan? Now that you've jumped his ass?
translation.es: ¿Qué vamos a hacer? ¿Ya que lo atacaste?

translation.en: - I don't know. Okay? You think, people. - You're the big writer.
translation.es: -No sé. ¡Piensen, señores! -Tú eres el escritor.

translation.en: - How long's that Valium gonna last? - Valium? What... What Valium?
translation.es: -¿Cuánto va a durar el Valium? -¿El Valium? ¿Cuál Valium?

translation.en: All right. Everybody calling these little guys here Valium,
translation.es: Todos llaman a esas pastillas Valium...

translation.en: It's more like acid mixed with acid, which is acid.
translation.es: Es más bien ácido mezclado con ácido, lo cual es ácido.

translation.en: And Oscar took one earlier by mistake, which is why he's been acting all crazy.
translation.es: Óscar tomó una antes por error. Por eso está como loquito.

translation.en: I just whipped up a simple batch for a friend.
translation.es: Le hice unas pastillas a un amigo.

translation.en: - What friend, Amy Winehouse? - Wait. Wait a minute.
translation.es: -¿Qué amigo, Amy Winehouse? -Un momento.

translation.en: You telling us that Elaine's boyfriend,
translation.es: ¿Entonces el novio de Elaine...

translation.en: old boy who knocked over our father's coffin,
translation.es: ...el chico que tumbó el ataúd de papá...

translation.en: - And you gave him how many? - About four or five.
translation.es: -¿Cuántas le diste? -Unas 4 ó 5.

translation.en: Four or five? Jesus, Norman! That poor bastard.
translation.es: ¿Cuatro o cinco? ¡Dios mío, Norman! Ese pobre desgraciado.

translation.en: - I thought they were Valium. - Look, you at a ten, I need you at a two.
translation.es: -¡Creía que era Valium! -Estás en 10, habla en 2.

translation.en: I mean, I wouldn't give somebody five cough drops.
translation.es: Yo no doy 5 pastillas ni para la tos.

translation.en: See, that's 'cause the wave cap is too tight.
translation.es: Es que traes la gorra demasiado apretada.

translation.en: If anyone finds out that this guy's been force- fed acid,
translation.es: Si se enteran que le dimos ácido...

translation.en: we could all be arrested. TMZ, here I come.
translation.es: ...nos arrestan. Noticiero, allá voy.

translation.en: A little bit. Possibly. It depends.
translation.es: Un poco. Posiblemente. Depende.

translation.en: We gotta buy some time until we figure this out.
translation.es: ...y ganar tiempo hasta resolver esto.

translation.en: You two stay here and watch him.
translation.es: Uds. dos quédense aquí y vigílenlo.

translation.en: This is all your fault. You and your chemistry set, man.
translation.es: Es culpa tuya. Tú y tu juego de química...

translation.en: - Ever since the ninth grade... - Shut up, Norman.
translation.es: -...desde la primaria. -Cállate, Norman.

translation.en: Reverend Davis wants to talk to the two of you.
translation.es: El reverendo quiere hablar con los dos.

translation.en: - Aaron, where's your tie? - I'm looking for it.
translation.es: -¿Y tu corbata? -La estoy buscando.

translation.en: Now, look, I have been patient, but I'm about done with patience.
translation.es: He tenido paciencia, pero ya se me está acabando.

translation.en: If we don't resume this funeral pretty soon,
translation.es: Si no reanudamos pronto el funeral...

translation.en: we gonna have to have a little conversation about my compensation.
translation.es: ...vamos a tener que hablar sobre mi compensación.

translation.en: Sure. Could I get five more minutes?
translation.es: Claro que sí. ¿Me da 5 minutos más?

translation.en: Why are you making me go through this again?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me haces repetir esto?

translation.en: - is 'cause your dad likes me. - No! It...
translation.es: ...porque le caigo bien a tu papá.

translation.en: - Can you... Can I get some help, please? - Good Lord, your skin's so supple...
translation.es: -¿Me ayudas, por favor? -Tu piel sigue siendo tan suave.

translation.en: The real reason why I don't wanna go out with you is because it was a mistake before.
translation.es: Si no salgo contigo es porque fue un error haber salido.

translation.en: We had a couple of intense months,
translation.es: Tuvimos unos momentos intensos...

translation.en: - but then I realized that we just... - Not fair, not true. We had a lot of fun. We...
translation.es: -...pero me di cuenta de... -No es cierto. La pasamos muy bien.

translation.en: - I bought you a watch, right? - Here.
translation.es: -Te compré un reloj, ¿verdad? -Toma.

translation.en: What about our first night together? After Norman's party?
translation.es: ¿Y nuestra primera noche juntos, qué?

translation.en: - That was amazing. Transcendent. - I was so drunk.
translation.es: -Fue increíble, trascendente. -Estaba borrachísima.

translation.en: - Thank you. - It's not a compliment, Derek! You know...
translation.es: -Gracias. -¡No es un cumplido, Derek!

translation.en: You still think about me though, don't you? Don't say anything.
translation.es: Todavía piensas en mí, ¿verdad? No digas nada.

translation.en: No, you... That belongs to this lady. You don't wanna eat that.
translation.es: No. Eso es de una señora. No se coma eso.

translation.en: It's women. Women are my problem, Uncle Russell.
translation.es: Mi problema son las mujeres, tío Russell.

translation.en: No such thing as having a woman without a problem.
translation.es: Donde hay mujeres hay problemas.

translation.en: Yeah. Let me tell you something about women.
translation.es: Déjame decirte una cosa sobre las mujeres.

translation.en: Smarter than you think they are,
translation.es: Son más listas de lo que crees...

translation.en: but not nearly as smart as they think they are.
translation.es: ...pero no tan listas como ellas creen.

translation.en: Yeah. I don't get it. She acts like I don't exist.
translation.es: No entiendo. Me trata como si no existiera.

translation.en: I can't believe she doesn't feel the way I do.
translation.es: No puedo creer que no me quiera.

translation.en: A woman wants a man who can control her.
translation.es: Ellas quieren hombres que las controlen.

translation.en: - Yeah, you think so? Is that what it is? - You walk up to her, and you shake her.
translation.es: -¿Ud. cree? ¿Eso es? -Te le acercas y la sacudes.

translation.en: - You want me to shake her? - Not shaking her hasn't worked, has it?
translation.es: -¿Quiere que la sacuda? -No la has sacudido y mira.

translation.en: I gotta take a shit. Man, just when I had my potato...
translation.es: Necesito cagar. Justo cuando conseguí mi ensalada de papas...

translation.en: - Look at his eyes. That doesn't look normal. - He looks like a zombie.
translation.es: -Mírale los ojos. Eso no parece normal. -Parece un zombi.

translation.en: - I need the toilet, open up! - Go deal with him.
translation.es: -¡Necesito el baño! ¡Abran! -Ve tú.

translation.en: - Can't you use the one upstairs? - I'm in a wheelchair, you fucking idiot!
translation.es: -¿No puede ir al de arriba? -¡Estoy en silla de ruedas!

translation.en: - Open the fucking door! - Let's put him behind the couch.
translation.es: Atrás del sofá. A las tres. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: - Open the goddamn door! - Just a minute. I'm trying to find the key.
translation.es: -¡Abre la maldita puerta! -¡Un minuto! ¡Estoy buscando la llave!

translation.en: I need the toilet, you fat bastard.
translation.es: ¡Necesito el baño, imbécil panzón!

translation.en: - Sorry, sorry. - I'm just going across the room
translation.es: ¡Voy al otro lado del cuarto...

translation.en: So you could use the bathroom, 'cause I know you gotta doo- doo.
translation.es: Para que pueda entrar y hacer popó.

translation.en: Now open the fucking door! Shit! Damn it.
translation.es: ¡Abre la condenada puerta! ¡Maldita sea!

translation.en: Get your ass out here. Uncle Russell nothing, man. Shit.
translation.es: ¡Ven acá! ¡Nada de tío Russell! ¡Mierda!

translation.en: - Stop thinking and do something. - Why do I gotta do something?
translation.es: -Deja de pensar y haz algo. -¿Por qué yo?

translation.en: - You the one that tied him up. - Well, somebody had to look out for Mama.
translation.es: -Tú fuiste el que lo amarró. -Para proteger a mamá.

translation.en: I been looking out for Mom since you got your book deal,
translation.es: ¡Yo la he protegido desde que salió tu libro...

translation.en: You burning with jealousy, all because I left and did what you always wanted to do?
translation.es: Ardes de envidia. Yo hago lo que tú siempre quisiste hacer.

translation.en: I couldn't just leave my family.
translation.es: Yo no podía dejar a mi familia.

translation.en: I got Mom, I got Dad, I got a wife. I got all sorts of responsibilities.
translation.es: Tengo a mamá, a papá, una esposa. Tengo responsabilidades.

translation.en: Don't put it off on responsibility.
translation.es: No fue por las responsabilidades.

translation.en: You spent three years on a novel, and you won't let anybody read it.
translation.es: Invertiste 3 años en tu novela y no dejas que nadie la lea.

translation.en: What you gonna do? Wait until you're dead?
translation.es: ¿Vas a esperar a que te mueras?

translation.en: What you think you're gonna be, the Tupac of books? Makaveli?
translation.es: ¿Crees que vas a ser el Tupac de los libros?

translation.en: At least I'm not some hack writing a bunch of crap, Mr. Mama's Secret.
translation.es: Al menos no escribo mierdas, señor El secreto de mamá.

translation.en: Mr. Black Hurt, it hurts to read that shit.
translation.es: ¡Señor Dolor negro! ¡Duele leer esa mierda!

translation.en: Mr. No Ink. Mr. Blank Page. Ain't nothing there. Ain't nothing there.
translation.es: Señor No tengo tinta. Señor Página en blanco. No hay nada ahí.

translation.en: At least my shit gets published.
translation.es: Al menos mis mierdas se publican.

translation.en: That's what it's about, just getting published?
translation.es: ¿Sólo importa que te publiquen?

translation.en: - Don't put your hand on me, Aaron. - I'll put my hand on you.
translation.es: -No me pongas la mano encima. -Te la pongo.

translation.en: - Don't touch me, man. - I'll put my hand upside you.
translation.es: -No me toques. -Te voy a pegar.

translation.en: - Here, look. How does that feel? - My ball. My ball.
translation.es: -¿Esto quieres? -¡Mi pelota! ¡Mi pelota!

translation.en: - Get off me. Tell her. - Tell me what?
translation.es: -¡Déjame! ¡Dile! -¿Que me diga qué?

translation.en: Remember the guy with the leather jacket?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas al del saco de piel?

translation.en: Okay, I don't know how to tell you this, but it looks like him and Dad were...
translation.es: No sé cómo decírtelo, pero parece que él y mi papá tenían...

translation.en: - I mean, maybe he's here making the... - We're sure.
translation.es: -Quizá esté inventando... -Estamos seguros.

translation.en: - is now this guy wants $30,000. - $30,000?
translation.es: ...que ahora el tipo quiere $30.000 dólares. ¿$30.000 dólares?

translation.en: Or else he's gonna start showing pictures of them doing stuff.
translation.es: Para no enseñar fotos de ellos haciendo cosas.

translation.en: - Stuff? Like what kind of stuff? - Sex stuff.
translation.es: -¿Qué clase de cosas? -Sexuales.

translation.en: - I got a goddamn torpedo coming down. - Wait a minute!
translation.es: ¡Está a punto de salírseme un torpedo!

translation.en: I'm goddamn handicapped! My drawers, my drawers.
translation.es: ¡Soy incapacitado! ¡Mis trusas!

translation.en: - Don't leave me here... - No, who calls them drawers?
translation.es: -¡Ayúdame! -¿Quién los llama trusas?

translation.en: My drawers! My drawers! Come on! Am I there? Come on. Shit.
translation.es: ¡Mis trusas! ¡Mis trusas! ¿Ya estoy ahí?

translation.en: - No! No! My hand is stuck! - How you get your hand...
translation.es: -¡No! ¡Tengo la mano atorada! -¿Cómo pusiste la mano...?

translation.en: - I love these padded seats. - No! No, my hand is stuck!
translation.es: -Amo los asientos acolchonados. -¡Se me atoró la mano!

translation.en: Would you rather be shitty- mouthed or get caught? Think.
translation.es: ¿Prefieres tener mierda en la boca o que te vean? ¡Piénsalo!

translation.en: Everything is copastetic. I'm gonna forget about the poop in my mouth.
translation.es: Todo está a la “prefección”. Olvidaré la popó en mi boca.

translation.en: - Just gonna hold my breath for a second. - It never was there, never was there.
translation.es: -Voy a contener el aliento. -Nunca estuvo ahí.

translation.en: - You okay? - Wake up. Come on, wake up, little buddy.
translation.es: -¿Estás bien? -Despierta. ¡Vamos, amiguito!

translation.en: Try another one. Bert, Ernie, I don't know, Big Bird, whatever.
translation.es: Usa otro nombre. Beto, Enrique, Abelardo.

translation.en: 'cause that's what people do when they're alive, right?
translation.es: Eso hace la gente cuando está viva.

translation.en: I'm gonna check to make sure he's breathing, 'cause he's gotta be breathing.
translation.es: Veré si está respirando. Tiene que respirar.

translation.en: Lord Jesus, please let him be breathing. He's not breathing.
translation.es: ¡Jesús bendito, deja que respire! No está respirando.

translation.en: We're just gonna give this guy half the money we saved.
translation.es: ¿Le vamos a dar la mitad de nuestros ahorros?

translation.en: - Well, how come you couldn't pay, Ryan? - That's not the point.
translation.es: -¿Por qué no pagas tú? -Eso no importa.

translation.en: Besides, the only reason Aaron tore up the check
translation.es: La única razón por la que rompió el cheque...

translation.en: is because little man was talking shit about his novel.
translation.es: ...fue porque el enanito criticó su novela.

translation.en: You won't let me read your novel, but you let that guy read your novel?
translation.es: ¿A mí no me dejas leer tu novela, pero a ese tipo sí?

translation.en: Let her go. She'll get over it.
translation.es: Deja que se vaya. Ya se le pasará.

translation.en: Hey. At least that white guy finally got what he deserved.
translation.es: Por lo menos ese blanco recibió su merecido.

translation.en: Our father was having gay sex with a guy that could fit in his pocket,
translation.es: ¿Papá tuvo sexo con un tipo que cabía en su bolsillo...

translation.en: and you're mad 'cause he's white?
translation.es: ...y tú te enojas porque es blanco?

translation.en: I don't give a fuck 'cause... Leave me be. I'm grieving.
translation.es: Me importa un carajo... Déjame en paz, estoy afligido.

translation.en: Norman. Why are you grinning like Louis Armstrong?
translation.es: ¿Por qué esa sonrisa de Louis Armstrong?

translation.en: Aaron, Ryan, could you please come to the study?
translation.es: Aarón, Ryan, vengan conmigo al estudio.

translation.en: Somebody call an ambulance. Get an... Get an ambulance.
translation.es: Un momento. Llamen una ambulancia. ¡Llamen una ambulancia!

translation.en: - Is there any other kind of dead, Aaron? - What did y'all do to him?
translation.es: -¿Hay otra clase de muerto? -¿Qué le hicieron?

translation.en: and I was expecting to find him that way when I got back.
translation.es: ...y esperaba encontrarlo igual!

translation.en: He got in a fight with the table and the table won.
translation.es: Se peleó con la mesita y...la mesita ganó.

translation.en: - Guys, what are we gonna do? - About 25 to life.
translation.es: -¿Y ahora, qué? -Condena perpetua.

translation.en: I think I have somewhere else to be right now.
translation.es: Creo que tengo que ir a algún lado.

translation.en: Ryan, I can't go to jail. I'm not jail type.
translation.es: ¡No puedo ir a la cárcel! ¡No aguantaría!

translation.en: You know how fast a rash spreads in prison?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cómo se esparcen las erupciones en la cárcel?

translation.en: Cut that shit out. No one here knows who this guy is.
translation.es: Déjate de idioteces. Nadie sabe quién es este tipo.

translation.en: Didn't notice him? He's four fucking feet tall.
translation.es: ¿No lo notaron? ¡Mide 1,20 metros!

translation.en: All we gotta do is get rid of the body.
translation.es: Eliminando el cuerpo parecerá...

translation.en: Takes me two months to get rid of a couch!
translation.es: ¡Tarda meses deshacerse de un sofá!

translation.en: Did anybody see the size of Uncle Edward's coffin?
translation.es: ¿Vieron el tamaño del ataúd del tío Edward?

translation.en: You wanna bury him with our father?
translation.es: ¿Lo quieres enterrar con nuestro papá?

translation.en: I mean, why not? It's not like anybody's gonna notice.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no? Nadie se va a dar cuenta.

translation.en: You gotta admit it makes sense, Aaron. I mean, think about it.
translation.es: Tienes que admitir que tiene sentido. Piénsalo.

translation.en: The coffin's here, the hole's in the ground.
translation.es: El ataúd está aquí, el hoyo está en el piso.

translation.en: I mean, unless you got a better suggestion, big bro.
translation.es: A menos que tengas una sugerencia mejor.

translation.en: It's funny. No matter what you say or how many times you say it,
translation.es: Es curioso. No importa lo que digas ni cuántas veces lo digas...

translation.en: I'm still convinced that we're gonna wind up together.
translation.es: ...sigo convencido de que acabaremos juntos.

translation.en: Elaine, I'm serious. You only live once. All right?
translation.es: En serio. Sólo se vive una vez.

translation.en: So, you might as well do whatever it is that's gonna make you the most happy.
translation.es: Debes hacer lo que más te haga más feliz.

translation.en: Maybe I found something outside of myself that I truly care about.
translation.es: Quizá yo encontré algo fuera de mí que me importa mucho.

translation.en: And I'm not talking about my father or his money.
translation.es: Y no estoy hablando de mi papá o de su dinero.

translation.en: - I care about you, Elaine. - You don't, Derek. You care about you.
translation.es: -Tú me importas. -No es cierto. Te importas tú.

translation.en: You care about me in relation to how I affect you.
translation.es: Te importo yo en relación a cómo te afecto.

translation.en: What is it about this guy? What does he have that I don't?
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene este tipo que yo no tenga?

translation.en: He helps people. He's considerate.
translation.es: Le ayuda a la gente. Es considerado...

translation.en: He's a bunch of things that you will never be.
translation.es: Es muchas cosas que tú nunca vas a ser.

translation.en: - Like naked on the roof. - What?
translation.es: Es un hombre desnudo en el techo.

translation.en: Listen to me, I should've done this hours ago.
translation.es: Debería haber hecho esto hace horas.

translation.en: - Elaine? Oh, God. - Get off me!
translation.es: -¿Elaine? ¡Dios mío! -¡Suéltame!

translation.en: - Could've had something beautiful, Elaine... - Oscar!
translation.es: Podíamos haber creado algo hermoso...

translation.en: ...but you had to ruin it. Not even bleeding. You hit like a girl.

translation.en: - so I'm coming up. - Elaine, this is a man's job!
translation.es: -...yo voy a subir. -¡Este es un trabajo de hombre!

translation.en: - Don't. - All the sperm I want. All the sperm I want.

translation.en: - You got that? - Be gentle, be gentle.

translation.en: but I need to make a confession.
translation.es: ...pero necesito confesarle algo.

translation.en: - I'm not a priest. - That's all right, 'cause I'm not a Catholic!
translation.es: -No soy un cura. -¡Perfecto, yo no soy católico!

translation.en: so if I eat whip cream in the wrong place, I'm gonna break out.

translation.en: Baby, you scared me. Don't do that.

translation.en: Someone's coming up. You're gonna be fine.

translation.en: Ryan, thank you so much for getting things back on track.

translation.en: - Good. - Thanks to you. And you.

translation.en: - Thank God you're safe. - Yes. We're good.

translation.es: -Mira, papá. -Elaine, no te metas.

translation.en: No! I'm not gonna stay out of it. This is my life.
translation.es: ¡No! Me voy a meter. Esta es mi vida.

translation.es: Si quieres verme a mí y a mi hijo...

translation.en: you better change your attitude. You got that?

translation.en: - Sorry, Uncle Russell. - Yeah, sorry about that.
translation.es: -¡Perdón, tío Russell! -Sí, perdón.

translation.en: Okay, I got your pants. I got your pants. Hold on.

translation.en: Now, I'd like to apologize on behalf of the family

translation.en: What the fuck you doing in my father's coffin?

translation.en: My picture. My beautiful memories!

translation.en: My father was an exceptional man.
translation.es: Mi padre era un hombre excepcional.

translation.en: But he worked hard for his family.
translation.es: Pero trabajó duro para mantener a su familia.

translation.en: was tell him how much we all loved, cherished and respected him.
translation.es: ...era decirle cuánto lo queríamos, lo apreciábamos y lo respetábamos.

translation.en: So, maybe he loved Dreamgirls more than most men.

translation.en: was teach us to chase after our dreams.
translation.es: Nos enseñó a tratar de realizar nuestros sueños.

translation.es: ...recuerden a mi padre como realmente era:

translation.en: a loving, kind, gentle man, that never judged anyone,
translation.es: Cariñoso, bueno, un hombre gentil que nunca juzgaba a nadie...

translation.en: who never cast disparaging remarks
translation.es: ...que nunca criticaba a nadie...

translation.en: or held prejudice against any race, creed, gender,
translation.es: ...ni tenía prejuicios contra ninguna raza, credo, género...

translation.en: Yeah. R. Kelly used the same car service.

translation.en: Wills and Kate most popular Royals ever.

translation.en: If we're not careful, the great British scum is going to want
translation.es: Después la escoria británica querrá saltarse una generación.

translation.en: Nonsense, Camilla. When I meet the people, they love me.
translation.es: Tonterías, Camilla. Cuando veo a la gente, me ama.

translation.en: the talking to Joe Pasquale at the Royal Variety Show,
translation.es: hablar con Joe Pasquale en The Royal Variety Show,

translation.en: Camilla, how can I sell my Cornish biscuits as organic

translation.en: they were made by seven- year- old orphans with Rickets.

translation.en: Are you all right? Oh, it's nothing, Wills.

translation.es: preferiría que no trajeras tantos electrodomésticos desechados.

translation.en: Hey, don't you have to be at the caff?

translation.en: I'm allowed three verbal warnings, and I've only had two. Hmmm.
translation.es: Me permiten tres advertencias verbales y solo tengo dos.

translation.en: I'm just saying, I think the Royal family are a complete waste of money.
translation.es: Solo digo que la familia real es un desperdicio de dinero.

translation.en: No, hang on a minute there, Alec, I think they do a very good job.

translation.es: Pero podemos llegar si alguien sabe pilotear.

translation.en: I can fly a helicopter. But if I make myself known, I'll blow my cover.
